T06asmahsbu:4: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute vācā padaiś cāmalair duḥkhasyottaraṇāya duḥkhitajane kāruṇyatas tanmayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5: dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ satveṣu tadgāmiṣu śliṣṭām arthagatiṃ niruttaragataṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan || AMsa_1.1 ||
T06asmahsbu:6: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute iti ka upadeśam ārabhya ko 'laṃkarotīti
T06asmahsbu:11: amalayā vāceti pauruṣayā amalaiḥ padair yuktaiḥ sahitair iti vistaraḥ |
T06asmahsbu:12: na hi vinā vācā padavyañjanair artho vibhāvayituṃ sakyata iti |
T06asmahsbu:18: uttamayānasya deśito vidhir yasmin dharme tasya dharmasya |
T06asmahsbu:27: tām idānīṃ pañcātmikāṃ arthagatiṃ dvitīyena ślokena darśyati |
T06asmahsbu:28: ghaṭitam iva suvarṇaṃ vārijaṃ vā vibuddhaṃ sukṛtam iva subhojyaṃ bhujyamānaṃ kṣudhārtaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:29: vidita iva sulekho ratnapeṭeva muktā vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti || AMsa_1.2
T06asmahsbu:30: anena ślokena pañcabhir dṛṣṭāntaiḥ sa hi dharmaḥ pañcavidham artham adhikṛtya deśitaḥ sādhyaṃ vyutpādyaṃ cintyam acintyaṃ pariniṣpannaṃ cādhigamārthaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ bodhipakṣasvabhāvaṃ so 'nena
T06asmahsbu:33: yadā sa dharmaḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ so
T06asmahsbu:34: 'laṃkriyata ity asya codyasya parihārārthaṃ trtīyaḥ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:35: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt
T06asmahsbu:36: tathā dharmaḥ soktaprakṛtiguṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthas tuṣṭiṃ
T06asmahsbu:39: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darśaṇagataṃ darśanavaśād viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayaty evaṃ sa dharmaḥ subhāṣitaiḥ prajkṛtyaiva guṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthas tuṣṭiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ janayati buddhimatām atas tuṣṭiviśeṣotpādanād alaṃkṛta iva bhavatīti |
T06asmahsbu:40: ataḥ paraṃ tribhiḥ ślokais tasmin dharme trividham upaśaṃsaṃ darśayaty ādarotpādanārthaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:42: dharmarmo dvayavyavasthāstho vyañjanato 'rtho na ca jñeyaḥ || AMsa_1.4 ||
T06asmahsbu:46: dharmas tathāyam abudhaṃ viparyayāt toṣayati tadvat || AMsa_1.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:53: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kutas tasyāyam anuśaṃso bhaviṣyatīty atra vipratipannas tasya buddhavacanatvaprasādhanārthaṃ kāraṇavibhājyam ārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:56: ādāv avyākaraṇāt yady etat saddharmāntarāye paścāt kenāpi utpāditaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:57: kasmād ādau bhavatā na vyākṛtam anāgatabhayavat |
T06asmahsbu:58: samapravṛtteḥ samakālaṃ ca śrāvakayānena mahāyānasya pravṛtter upalabhyate na paścād iti katham asyābuddhavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate |
T06asmahsbu:59: agocarān nāyam evam udāro gambhīraś ca dharmas tārkikāṇāṃ gocaraḥ |
T06asmahsbu:65: sa eva buddho yo 'bhisaṃbudhya evam bhāṣate |
T06asmahsbu:66: bhāvābhāve 'bhāvād yadi mahāyānaṃ kiṃcid asti tasya bhāva siddhim idaṃ buddhavacanam ato
T06asmahsbu:69: śrāvakayānaṃ budhavacanaṃ na mahāyānam iti na yujyate vinā buddhayānena buddhānām anutpādāt
T06asmahsbu:70: pratipakṣatvād bhāvyamānaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ sarvanirvikalpajñānāśrayatvena kleśānāṃ pratipakṣo bhavati tasmād buddhavacanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:71: rutānyatvāt na cāsya yathārutam arthas tasmān na yathārutārthānusāreṇedam abuddhavacanaṃ veditavyaṃ
T06asmahsbu:72: yad uktam ādāv avyākaraṇād ity anābhogād etad anāgataṃ bhagavatā na vyākṛtam iti kasyacit syād ata upekṣāyā ayoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:74: adhvany anyanāvṛtajñānā upekṣāto na yujyate || AMsa_1.8 ||
T06asmahsbu:77: tribhiḥ kāraṇair anāgatasya mahataḥ śāsanopadravasyopkeṣā na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:78: buddhānām ayatnato jñānapravṛtteḥ pratyakṣacakṣuṣkatayā śāsanarakṣayāś ca yatnavatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:81: etad eva śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānam etenaiva mahābodhiprāptir iti kasyacit syād ataḥ śrāvakayānasya mahāyānatvāyoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:83: na śrāvakayānam idaṃ bhavati mahāyānadharmākhyam || AMsa_1.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:84: vaikalyāt parārthopadeśasya na hi śrāvakayāne kaścit parārtha upadiṣṭaḥ śrāvakāṇām ātmano nirvidvirāgavimuktimātropāyopadeśāt |
T06asmahsbu:85: na ca svārtha eva pareṣūpadiśyamānaḥ parārtho bhavitum arhati |
T06asmahsbu:86: virodhāt svārthe hi paro niyujyamānaḥ svārtha eva prayujyate sa ātmana eva parinirvāṇārthaprayukto
T06asmahsbu:88: na ca śrāvakayānenaiva cirakālaṃ bodhau ghaṭamāno buddho bhavitum arhati |
T06asmahsbu:90: anupāyo hi śrāvakayānaṃ buddhatvasya na cānupāyena ciram api prayujyamānaḥ prārthitam arthaṃ prāpnoti |
T06asmahsbu:93: tathāpy anupadeśān na śrāvakayānam eva mahāyānaṃ bhavitum arhati |
T06asmahsbu:94: na hi sa tādṛśa upadeśa etasminn upalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:95: viruddham vā cānyonyaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ cety anyonyavirodhe ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:97: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat || AMsa_1.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:101: śrāvakayāne hy ātmaparinirvāṇāyaivāśayas tadartham evaupadeśas tadartham eva prayogaḥ parīttaś ca puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃgṛhīta upastambhaḥ kālena cālpena tadarthaprāptir yāvat tribhir api janmabhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:103: tasmād anyonyavirodhād yad yānaṃ hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat |
T06asmahsbu:105: buddhavacanasyedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yat sūtre 'vatarati vinaye saṃdṛśyate dharmatāṃ ca na vilomayati
T06asmahsbu:108: tasmān na buddhavacanam iti kasyacit syād ato lakṣaṇavirodhe ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:110: audāryād api gāmbhīryād aviruddhaiva dharmatā || AMsa_1.11 ||
T06asmahsbu:112: avataraty evedaṃ svasmin mahāyānasūtre svasya ca śleśasya vinayaḥ saṃdṛśyate |
T06asmahsbu:116: na dharmatāṃ vilomayaty athaiva hi dharmatā mahābodhiprāpataye tasmān nāsti lakṣaṇavirodhaḥ
T06asmahsbu:117: agocarād ity uktam atas tarkagocaratvāyoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:119: bālāśrayo matas tarkas tasyāto viṣayo na tat || AMsa_1.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:120: adṛṣṭasatyāśreyo hi tarkaḥ kaścid āgamaniśrito bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:125: mahāyānas tu na niśritaṃ yāvat akhedavat |
T06asmahsbu:128: anupāyatvāt śrāvakayāne na buddhatvaṃ prāptam ity uktam atha mahāyānaṃ katham upāyo yukta ity upāyatvayoge ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:130: deśanā'to dvayasyāsmin sa copāyo niruttare || AMsa_1.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:132: prabhāv audāryadeśanayā satvānāṃ paripāko prabhāv adhimuktito ghaṭanāt |
T06asmahsbu:133: gāmbhīryadeśanayā avikalpanā ata etasya dvayasyāsmin mahāyāne deśanā sa copāyo niruttare jñāne tābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ
T06asmahsbu:135: ye punar asmāt trasanti tadartham asthānatrāsādīnave kāraṇatvena ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:136: tadasthānatrāso bhavati jagatāṃ dāhakaraṇo mahāpuṇyaskandhaprasavakaraṇād dīrghasamayam |
T06asmahsbu:137: agotro 'sanmitro 'kṛtamatir apūrvācitaśubhas trasaty asmin dharme patati mahato 'rthād gata iha || AMsa_1.14 ||
T06asmahsbu:143: yena ca kāraṇena yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tat saṃdarśayati |

T06asmahsbu:145: gotraṃ cāsya na bhavati sanmitraṃ vā avyutpannamatir vā bhavati mahāyānadharmatāyāṃ pūrvaṃ vānupacitaśubho bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:149: trāsakāraṇam uktam atrāsakāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ity atrāsakāraṇatve ślokaḥ |

T06asmahsbu:160: anyathā hi sakṛt pratiṣedhamātrakṛtam abhaviṣyad iti |

T06asmahsbu:162: bhagavati ca bhāvātigahanād atigahanaś ca buddhānāṃ bhāvo durājñeyas tasmān nāsmabhis tadajñānāt trasitavyam iti |
T06asmahsbu:163: (Msa 7) evaṃ yoniśaḥ pravicayād viduṣāṃ trāso na bhavati
T06asmahsbu:165: śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo manaskārāj jñānaṃ prabhavati ca tatvārthaviṣayam
T06asmahsbu:166: tato dharmaprāptiḥ prabhavati ca tasmin matirato yadā pratyātmaṃ sā katham asati tasmin vyavasitiḥ śrutaṃ niśrityādau manaskāraḥ prabhavati yo yoniśa ity arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:167: yoniśo manasikārāt tatvārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prabhavati lokottarā samyagdṛṣṭis tatas tat phalasya dharmasya prāptis tatas tasmin prāpte matir vimuktijñānaṃ prādurbhavati |
T06asmahsbu:168: evaṃ yadā pratyātmaṃ sā matir bhavati |

T06asmahsbu:174: atha buddho 'pi gambhīrasya padārthasya na boddhā sa kiṃ gabhīraṃ deśayiṣyatīty uttrāsapadaṃ tad ayuktaṃ |

T06asmahsbu:176: atha kasmād gabhīrārthavidām evam mokṣo na tārkikāṇām ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:180: yasya hīnā cādhimuktis tataś ca hīna eva dhātuḥ samudāgata ālayavijñānabhāvanā |

T06asmahsbu:183: śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattāṃ labdhvā śrute yaḥ prakaroty avajñāṃ |

T06asmahsbu:186: (Msa 8) śrutānusāreṇaiva hi buddhimattvaṃ labdhvā yaḥ śruta evāvajñāṃ karoti mūḍhaḥ sa saty evāvaśiṣṭe śrute vicitre cāprameye ca kutaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:187: kāraṇān niścayam eti na tad buddhavacanam iti |
T06asmahsbu:188: na hi tasya śrutād anyad balam asti tasmād aśrutvā pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ |

T06asmahsbu:193: hānim upaiti buddher iti yathābhūtajñānād aprāptiparihānitaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:194: dharmasya ca svākhyātatāṃ pratikṣipati tan nidānaṃ cāpuṇyaprabhāvāt kṣatiṃ prāpnoti

T06asmahsbu:196: ayathāvataś cārtham avijānato 'pi pratighāto na yukta
T06asmahsbu:198: manaḥ pradoṣaḥ prakṛtipraduṣṭo 'yathārute cāpi hy ayuktarūpaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:199: prāg eva saṃdehagatasya dharme tasmād upekṣaiva varaṃ hy adoṣā ||

T06asmahsbu:325: gāmbhīryāudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktir bhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca |
T06asmahsbu:326: saṃpattiś cāvasāne dvayagataparamā yad bhavaty eva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisatvaprakṛtiguṇavatas tatprapuṣṭāc ca gotrāt || AMsa_3.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:327: yadgābhīryāudāryavādini parahitakriyārthamukte vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme gāmbhīryāudāryārtham ajñātvaivādhimuktir vipulā bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:329: saṃpattiś cāvasāne mahābodhirdvayagatāyāḥ saṃpatteḥ paramā tatprakṛtyā guṇavataḥ paripuṣṭasya ca bodhisatvagotrasya māhātmyaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:330: dvayagatā iti dvaye laukikāḥ śrāvakāś ca |
T06asmahsbu:334: svaparahitasukhakriyāphalatvād bhavati samudagrasamūlam udagragotram etat || AMsa_3.13
T06asmahsbu:335: svaparahitaphalasya bodhivṛkṣasya praśastamūlatvam anena bodhisatvagotraṃ saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:336: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre gotrādhikāras tṛtīyaḥ CHAPITRE IV caturtho 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:344: (Msa 14) so 'yaṃ trividho guṇāḥ paridīpitaḥ puruṣakāraguṇo dvābhyāṃ padābhyām arthakriyāguṇaḥ phalaparigrahaguṇaś ca dvābhyāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:346: iti triguṇā dvayālambanā ca cetanā cittotpāda ity ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:361: sadā pāramitāyoganiryāṇaś ca sa kathyate || AMsa_4.5 ||
T06asmahsbu:365: kiṃmūla eṣa caturvidho bodhisatvānāṃ cittotpādaḥ kimāśayaḥ kimadhimokṣaḥ kimālambanaḥ kiṃyānaḥ kiṃpratiṣṭhaḥ kimādīnavaḥ kimanuśaṃsaḥ kiṃniryāṇaḥ kiṃparyavasāna iti |
T06asmahsbu:379: yasyāṃ bhūmau yaḥ prayuktas tasya tadbhūmiparyavasānaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:384: yo hi parākhyānāc cittotpādaḥ paravijñāpanāt sa ucyate samādānasāṃketikaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:385: sa punar mitrabalād vā bhavati kalyāṇamitrānurodhāt |
T06asmahsbu:388: chrutabalād vā tatra tatra dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bahūnāṃ bodhicittotpādāt |
T06asmahsbu:389: śubhābhyāsād vā dṛṣṭa iva dharme satataśravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇādibhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:394: dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve |
T06asmahsbu:397: kauśalyaṃ pariśiṣṭe niryāṇaṃ caiva vijñeyam || AMsa_4.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:399: dhyānamaye sukhagarbhe karuṇā saṃvardhikā dhātrī || AMsa_4.11 ||
T06asmahsbu:403: āśayaśuddhir jñeyā kauśalyaṃ tv anyabhūmigatam || AMsa_4.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:407: sa ca pāramārthikaś cittotpādaḥ pramuditāyāṃ bhūmāv iti |
T06asmahsbu:411: satvakṛtyeṣu samacittatā ātmana iva teṣāṃ duḥkhakṣayākāṅkṣaṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:413: tasminn eva ca pāramārthikacottotpāde ṣaḍarthā veditavyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:414: janma audāryam utsāha āśayaśuddhiḥ pariśiṣṭakauśalyaṃ niryāṇaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:422: kathaṃ manasikāreṇa tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanājñānāt kalpanāmātram etad iti |
T06asmahsbu:435: meghasadṛśaś ca kathitaś cittotpādo jinātmajānāṃ hi |
T06asmahsbu:436: tasmāt tathā guṇāḍhyaṃ cittaṃ muditaiḥ samutpādyam || AMsa_4.20 ||
T06asmahsbu:438: āśayasahagataś ca cittotpādaḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇasadṛśo hitasukhādhyāśayasya vikārābhajanāt |
T06asmahsbu:466: mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tat sukham ||
T06asmahsbu:467: tena cittotpādena varjitāḥ satvāś caturvidhaṃ sukhaṃ na labhante yad bodhisatvānāṃ parārthacintanāt sukhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:470: yac ca paramatvasya dharmanairātmyasya saṃdarśanāt sukhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:472: sahodayāc cittavarasya dhīmataḥ susaṃvṛtaṃ cittam anantaduṣkṛtāt |
T06asmahsbu:473: sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluś ca vivardhanadvayam ||
T06asmahsbu:474: tasya cittavarasya sahodayāt bodhisatvasya susaṃvṛtaṃ cittaṃ bhavaty anantasatvādhiṣṭhānād (Msa 18) duṣkṛtād ato 'sya durgatito bhayaṃ na
T06asmahsbu:476: sa ca dvayaṃ vardhayan śubhaṃ ca karma kṛpā ca nityaṃ ca śubhī bhavati kṛpāluś ca tena ca sadā modate |
T06asmahsbu:481: yad ānapekṣaḥ svaśarīrajīvite parārtham abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam |
T06asmahsbu:482: paroghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravatsyati ||
T06asmahsbu:483: asya piṇḍārtho yasya para eva priyataro nātmā parārthaṃ svaśarīrajīvite ānapekṣatvāt abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam |
T06asmahsbu:484: sa katham ātmārthaṃ paroghātena duṣkṛte karmaṇi pravatsyatīti |
T06asmahsbu:486: māyopamān vīkṣya sa sarvadharmān udyānayātrām iva copapattīḥ |
T06asmahsbu:487: kleśāc ca duḥkhāc ca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle ||
T06asmahsbu:488: svakā guṇāḥ satvahitāc ca modaḥ saṃcintyajanma rddhivikurvitaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:489: vibhūṣaṇaṃ bhojanam agrabhūmiḥ krīḍāratir nityakṛpātmakānām || AMsa_4.25
T06asmahsbu:490: māyopamasarvadharmalakṣaṇāt sa bodhisatvaḥ saṃpattikāle kleśebhyo na bibheti |
T06asmahsbu:498: parārtham udyogavataḥ kṛpātmano hy avīcir apy eti yato 'sya ramyatām |
T06asmahsbu:499: kutaḥ punas trasyati tādṛśo bhavan parāśrayair duḥkhasamudbhavair bhave ||
T06asmahsbu:500: api ca yasya parārtham udyogavataḥ karuṇātmatvād avīcir apy ramyaḥ sa kathaṃ parārthanimittair duḥkhotpādair bhave punas trāsam āpatsyate yato
T06asmahsbu:504: parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā ||
T06asmahsbu:506: yasya mahākaruṇācāryeṇa nityoṣito ātmā paraduḥkhaiś ca duḥkhitaṃ cetas tasyotpanne parārthaṃ karaṇīye yadi paraiḥ samādāpanā kartavyā bhavati atilajjanā |
T06asmahsbu:508: śirasi vinihitoccasatvabhāraḥ śithilagatir na hi śobhate 'grasatvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:510: śirasi mahāntaṃ satvabhāraṃ vinidhāya bodhisatvaḥ śithilaṃ parākramamāṇo na śobhate śataguṇaṃ hi sa vīryaṃ kartum arhati śrāvakavīryāt tathā hi svaparavavidhair vividhair atyarthaṃ baddhaḥ kleśakarmajanmasvabhāvaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:511: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre cittopādādhikāraś caturthaḥ CHAPITRE V pañcamo 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:524: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvā 'dhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe
T06asmahsbu:525: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarām iṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisatvasya (Msa 20) kaḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā |
T06asmahsbu:528: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇā ripau |
T06asmahsbu:529: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate ||
T06asmahsbu:530: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tat sādhayati parārtham ātmano 'tyarthaṃ saṃtāpanāt
T06asmahsbu:533: vinītir arthe paripācanā śubhe tathāvavādasthitibuddhimuktayaḥ || AMsa_5.4
T06asmahsbu:534: guṇair viśiṣṭaiḥ samudāgamas tathā kulodayo vyākaraṇābhiṣiktatā |
T06asmahsbu:535: tathāgatajñānam anuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:536: trividhe satvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrasthe trayodaśavidho bodhisatvasya parārthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:546: aṣṭamyāṃ bhūbhau vyākaraṇaṃ daśamyām abhiśekaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:547: saha tathāgatajñānenety eṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisatvasya
T06asmahsbu:550: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā 'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattir uttamā ||
T06asmahsbu:551: yathā 'sau parārthapratipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:556: na ṛddhā manyate na cāvatāritān satvān mamāyati |
T06asmahsbu:562: na hy adūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:563: sarvā caiṣā parārthapratipattir bodhisatvānām akṣayā (Msa 21) bhavaty abhyupagatasatvākṣayatvād ato 'pi
T06asmahsbu:566: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:567: pratisvam ādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhigame kṛpātmakaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:568: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārtham udyataḥ sadā tad aprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām |
T06asmahsbu:569: sadā tu dhīro hi parārtham udyato dvayārtham ādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim ||
T06asmahsbu:571: | calaṃ viparyāsasukhaṃ rūparūpyabhavapriyāṇām anityatvāt paramārthaduḥkhatvāc ca saṃskāraduḥkhatayā
T06asmahsbu:573: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkham evāpnoti |
T06asmahsbu:574: bodhisatvas tu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnoty ayam asyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:576: yathā yathā hy akṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:577: tathā tathā yuktasamānatāpadair hitāya satveṣv abhisaṃskaroti tat ||
T06asmahsbu:578: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisatvaḥ pravartate |
T06asmahsbu:579: īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānas tena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanair hitārthaṃ satveṣu tat sarvam abhisaṃskaroti |
T06asmahsbu:582: sadā 'svatantrīkṛtadoṣacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti buddhimān |
T06asmahsbu:583: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ || AMsa_5.10
T06asmahsbu:584: sadā kleśair asvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti bodhisatvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:590: vividhaguṇagaṇair vivardhamānā jagad upaguhya sadā kṛpāśayena || AMsa_5.11
T06asmahsbu:592: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhām abhibhayagamanāt |
T06asmahsbu:595: 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvā nadaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ
T06asmahsbu:598: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre pratipattyadhikāraḥ pañcamaḥ CHAPITRE VI ṣaṣṭho 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:600: na san na cāsan na tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate |
T06asmahsbu:601: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punar viśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ ||
T06asmahsbu:607: na jāyate na ca vyety anabhisaṃskṛtatvād dharmadhātoḥ |
T06asmahsbu:608: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayor nirodhotpāde tadavasthatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:609: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt |
T06asmahsbu:610: ity etat pañcavidham advayalakṣaṇaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:612: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayam ātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā |
T06asmahsbu:613: dvayān na cānyad bhrama eṣa tatūditas tataś ca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ
T06asmahsbu:617: tathā hi sā vilakṣaṇā ātmalakṣaṇāt parikalpitāt |
T06asmahsbu:619: nāpy ato dvayād anyad ātmalakṣaṇam upapadyate |
T06asmahsbu:621: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyam ātmadṛṣṭis tasmād eva cātmābhāvān mokṣo 'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyo na tu kaścin muktaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:623: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātram āśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām |
T06asmahsbu:624: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ || AMsa_6.3
T06asmahsbu:626: tamaḥ prakāraḥ katamo 'yam īdṛśo yato 'vipaśyan sadasan nirīkṣate ||
T06asmahsbu:627: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātram ātmadarśanaṃ niśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati |
T06asmahsbu:633: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti |
T06asmahsbu:636: katamo 'yam īdṛśas tamaḥprakāro lokasya yad vidyamānaṃ pratītyasamutpādam avipaśyan na vidyamānam ātmānaṃ nirīkṣate |
T06asmahsbu:637: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānam adraṣṭuṃ syān na tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭum iti |
T06asmahsbu:639: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanor iha |
T06asmahsbu:640: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām ||
T06asmahsbu:641: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā |
T06asmahsbu:642: tathāpi janmakṣayān mokṣaprāptir bhavaty eva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti |
T06asmahsbu:644: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāram anantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisatvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:645: dharmeṣu cintāsuviniśriś citatvāj jalpānvayām arthagatiṃ paraiti ||
T06asmahsbu:647: arthān sa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre |
T06asmahsbu:648: pratyakṣatām eti ca dharmadhātus tasmād viyukto dvayalakṣaṇena || AMsa_6.7
T06asmahsbu:649: nāstīti cittāt param etya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvam upaiti tasmāt |
T06asmahsbu:652: tadāśrayo gahvaradoṣasaṃcayo mahāgadeneva viṣaṃ nirasyate || AMsa_6.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:653: ekena saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratvaṃ dharmacintāsuviniśritatvaṃ samādhiniśrityabhāvanāt manojalpāc ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthaprakhyānāvagamāt tatpraveśaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:655: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthān viditvā tadābhāse cittamātre 'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisatvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā |
T06asmahsbu:656: tataḥ pareṇa dharmadhātoḥ pratyakṣato gamane dvayalakṣaṇena viyukto grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena iyaṃ darśanamārgāvasthā |
T06asmahsbu:657: tṛtīyena yathāsau dhamadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti tad darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:659: cittād anyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstīty avagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhyaṃbhāve grāhakābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:660: dvaye cāsya nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātau avasthānam atadgatir grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahita evaṃ dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti |
T06asmahsbu:662: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūra-anupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcayasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt |
T06asmahsbu:665: smṛtim agatim avagamya kalpamātrāṃ vrajati guṇārṇavapāramāśudhīraḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:666: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matim upanividhāya yā smṛtir upalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ kalpanāmātrām avagacchaty evaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃ buddhatvam āśu vrajatīty etat paramārthajñānasya māhātmyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:672: jñānaṃ hi sarvatragasaprabhedeṣv avyāhataṃ dhīr agataḥ prabhāvaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:674: vāci jñānaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñāyāṃ vācaṃ tatra gatvopapannā bhāṣante |
T06asmahsbu:678: niḥsaraṇe jñānam āsravakṣayābhijñā yathā satvā upapattito niḥsarantīti |
T06asmahsbu:679: eṣu ṣaṭsvartheṣu sarvatra lokadhātau sapramedeṣu padāparokṣam avyāhataṃ jñānaṃ sa prabhāvo bodhisatvānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñāsaṃgṛhītaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:684: yena niśrayeṇa yena jñānena yena manasikāreṇa tasya prabhāvasya samudāgamas tatsaṃdarśayati
T06asmahsbu:686: yenāryadivyāpratimair vihārair brāhmaiś ca nityaṃ viharaty udāraiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:687: buddhāṃś ca satvāṃś ca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayaty ānayate viśuddhim ||
T06asmahsbu:689: ātmana āryādisukhavihāram atulyaṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ ca lokadhātvantareṣu gatvā buddhānāṃ pūjanaṃ satvānāṃ viśodhanaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:692: māyopamān paśyati lokadhātūn sarvān sasatvān savivartanāśān |
T06asmahsbu:693: saṃdarśayaty eva ca tān yatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrair api sa prakāraiḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:695: svayaṃ ca sarvalokadhātūnāṃ sasatvānāṃ savivartasaṃvartānāṃ māyopamatvadarśanāt |
T06asmahsbu:702: raśmipramokṣair bhṛśaduḥkhitāṃś ca āpāyikān svargagatān karoti |
T06asmahsbu:703: mārānvayān kṣubdhavimānaśobhān saṃkampayaṃ srāsayate samārān || AMsa_7.5
T06asmahsbu:709: sakarmajanmottamanirmitaiś ca satvārtham ātiṣṭhati sarvakālam || AMsa_7.6
T06asmahsbu:710: aprameyasamādhivikrīḍitasaṃdarśanāt buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalamadhye trividhena nirmāṇena sadā satvārthakaraṇāc ca |
T06asmahsbu:716: abuddhanāmeṣu ca buddhanāma saṃśrāvaṇāt tān kṣipate 'nyadhātau || AMsa_7.7
T06asmahsbu:719: satvapariśodhanayā ca buddhanāmavirahiteṣu (Msa 27) lokadhātuṣūpapannānāṃ satvānāṃ buddhanāmasaṃśrāvaṇayā prasādaṃ grāhayitvā tadavirahiteṣu lokadhātuṣūpapādanāt |
T06asmahsbu:721: śakto bhavaty eva ca satvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakunir yathaiva |
T06asmahsbu:722: buddhāt praśaṃsāṃ labhate 'timātrām ādeyavākyo bhavati prajānām ||
T06asmahsbu:726: ṣaḍdhāpy abhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣā 'bhibhuvas tathā'ṣṭau |
T06asmahsbu:727: daśāpi kṛtsnāyatanāny ameyāḥ samādhayo dhīragataḥ prabhāvaḥ || AMsa_7.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:730: evaṃ ṣaḍarthena vibhāgalakṣaṇena prabhāvaṃ darśayitvā tanmāhātmyodbhāvanārthaṃ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:731: sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhir jagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam |
T06asmahsbu:732: parahitakaraṇaikatābhirāmaś carati bhaveṣu hi siṃhavat sudhīraḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:734: vaśitāmāhātmyaṃ svayaṃ paramajñānavaśitvaprāptyā kleśāsvavaśasya jagataḥ svavaśe sthāpanāt
T06asmahsbu:737: prabhāvādhikāraḥ mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre saptamaḥ CHAPITRE VIII aṣṭamo 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:739: rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvam eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:740: ahāryatāṅgaiḥ samupetatā bhṛśaṃ jinātmaje tatparipākalakṣaṇam || AMsa_8.1
T06asmahsbu:742: rucir mahāyānadeśanādharme prasādas taddeśike praśamaḥ kleśānām anukampā satveṣu kṣamā duṣkaracaryāyāṃ medhā grahaṇadhāraṇaprativedheṣu prabalatvam adhigame ahāryatā māraparapravādibhiḥ prāhāṇikāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatatvaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:744: eṣa samāsena bodhisatvānāṃ navaprakāra ātmaparipāko veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:754: yaś ca tasyāḥ paripāka ugravīryaparārdhaniṣṭhāyuktaḥ svabhāvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:758: jinātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam ||
T06asmahsbu:759: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:760: guṇajñatā ity api sa bhagavāṃs tathāgata iti vistareṇa kāraṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:765: jīnātmaje kleśavinodanāya tan mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam || AMsa_8.4
T06asmahsbu:767: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:772: kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam |
T06asmahsbu:774: svaprakṛtyā ca gotreṇa paraduḥkhadarśanena nihīnayānaparivarjanatayā ca paripacyata iti kāraṇaṃ
T06asmahsbu:780: dhṛtiḥ sahanaṃ kṣāntir iti paryāyās tatparipāke gotraṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ bhāvanā ca kāraṇaṃ
T06asmahsbu:785: smṛter mahābuddhyudaye ca yogyatā sumedhatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam ||
T06asmahsbu:787: śrutacintitabhāvitacirakṛtacirabhāṣitānām asaṃmoṣatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitārthasupraviṣṭatā ca smṛter medhāparipākasvabhāvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:792: tatra puṇyajñānadvayena tasya puṇyajñānadvayasya bījapuṣṭatā tatparipāke kāraṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:797: punaḥ sadā māranirantarāyatā ahāryatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam || AMsa_8.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:800: māranirantarāyatā svabhāvo yadā māro na punaḥ śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ |
T06asmahsbu:804: jinātmaje hy aṅgasamanvaye punar mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam ||
T06asmahsbu:809: iti navavidhavas tu pācitātmā paraparipācanayogyatām upetaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:816: vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā |
T06asmahsbu:821: evaṃ satvānām āśraye vraṇabhojanasthānīye srāvaṇasthānīyaṃ vipakṣaśamanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:826: vipācanoktā paripācanā tathā prapācanā cāpy anupācanāparā |
T06asmahsbu:827: supācanā cāpy adhipācanā matā nipācanotpācananā ca dehiṣu || AMsa_8.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:840: tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣv api suvyavasthitāḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:841: tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane |
T06asmahsbu:842: yathā kṛpātmā parasatvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanātmataḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:844: yādṛśenāśayena bodhisatvaḥ satvān paripācayati tam āśayaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:846: ātmavatsalas tu loka ātmānaṃ hite ca sukhe ca saṃniyojayati |
T06asmahsbu:847: avaśiṣṭaiḥ ślokair yena prayogeṇa satvān paripācayati taṃ pāramitāpratipattyā saṃdarśayati
T06asmahsbu:848: yādṛśena dānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:849: na bodhisatvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣv adeyaṃ punar asti sarvathā |
T06asmahsbu:850: anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samair dānaguṇair na tṛpyate ||
T06asmahsbu:856: yādṛśena śīlena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:858: paraṃparānugrahakṛt dvidhā pare vipākaniṣyandaguṇena pācakaḥ || AMsa_8.17
T06asmahsbu:871: yādṛśyā kṣāntyā yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:878: saṃparāyānugraheṇa copāyajñas tair apakāramarṣaṇair āvarjyāpakāriṇāṃ kuśale samādāpanāt |
T06asmahsbu:879: yādṛśena vīryeṇa yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:880: punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:881: jinātmajaḥ satvagaṇaṃ prapācayan paraikacittasya śubhasya kāraṇāt ||
T06asmahsbu:885: kuśalacittasaṃniyojanāt dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyānugraheṇeti yādṛśena dhyānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:886: vaśitvam āgamya manasy anuttaraṃ paraṃ samāvarjayate 'tra śāsane |
T06asmahsbu:887: nihatya sarvām avamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:888: prāptānuttaravaśitvena dhyānena nirāmiṣeṇa ca nihatasarvāvamānābhilāṣeṇa paripācayati |
T06asmahsbu:889: buddhaśāsane parasyāvarjanād āvarjitasya ca kuśaladharmasaṃvardhanāt paripācayati |
T06asmahsbu:890: yādṛśyā prajñayā yathā satvān paripācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:891: sa tatvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti satvān suvinītasaṃśayān |
T06asmahsbu:892: tataś ca te tajjinaśāsanād arād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:893: sa bodhisatvas tatvārthanaye cābhiprāyārthanaye ca suviniścitayā prajñayā paripācayati |
T06asmahsbu:897: iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagad akhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisatvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:899: anena yatra ca vinayati sugatigamane yānatraye vā |
T06asmahsbu:904: yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tatparidīpanāt samāsena paripākamāhātmyaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:905: tatra tanuḥ prakāro 'dhimukticaryābhūmau bodhisatvasya paramo 'ṣṭamyādiṣu vimadhyamaḥ saptasu veditavyaḥ yāval lokasya bhāvas tatsamānayā gatyā atyantam ity arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:914: kṛtvā duṣkaram adbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt |
T06asmahsbu:915: sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānām iva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhātitā samudāgamataḥ svabhāvata aupamyataś ca buddhatvam udbhāvitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:916: yāvadbhir duṣkaraśatair yāvadbhiḥ kuśalasaṃbhārair yāvatā kālena yāvataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇasya prahāṇāt samudāgacchatyayaṃ samudāgamaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:920: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva na kaścana |
T06asmahsbu:921: śukladharmamayaṃ tac ca na ca tais tannirūpyate || AMsa_9.4 ||
T06asmahsbu:924: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ tathatāyā abhinnatvāt tadviśuddhiprabhāvitatvāc ca buddhatvasya na ca kaś ciddharmo 'sti parikalpitena dharmasvabhāvena śukladharmamayaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ pāramitādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ tadbhāvena
T06asmahsbu:926: na ca tais tān nirdiśyate pāramitādīnāṃ pāramitādibhāvenāpariniṣpatter idam advayalakṣaṇaṃ
T06asmahsbu:928: deśanā dharmaratnānāṃ tatprabhavatvāt kuśalasasyānāṃ ca vineyasaṃtānakṣetreṣu |
T06asmahsbu:929: buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditam atha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūter dharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmaratnākarābham |
T06asmahsbu:930: bhūtānāṃ śuklasasya prasavasumahato hetuto meghabhūtaṃ dānād dharmāmbuvarṣapratatasuvihitasyākṣayasya prajāsu || AMsa_9.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:931: anena tṛtīyena ślokena tam evārthaṃ nirdiśati |
T06asmahsbu:932: sumahataḥ pratatasya dharmaratnasya prodbhūter nimittatvād ratnākarābhaṃ bhūtānāṃ mahataḥ śuklasasya prasavahetutvān meghabhūtaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:933: mahataḥ suvihitasyākṣayasya dharmāmbuvarṣasya dānāt prajāsv ity ayam atra padavigraho veditavyaḥ
T06asmahsbu:939: satkāyād dhīnayānāc ca tasmāc charaṇam uttamam || AMsa_9.8 ||
T06asmahsbu:941: tatra sarvopadravaparitrāṇatvaṃ (Msa 35) yad buddhānubhāvena andhāś cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante badhirāḥ śrotraṃ vikṣiptacittāḥ svasthacittamītayaḥ
T06asmahsbu:943: apāyaparitrāṇatvaṃ buddhaprabhayā tadgatānāṃ mokṣaṇāt tadagamane ca pratiṣṭhāpanāt |
T06asmahsbu:947: śaraṇam anupamaṃ tacchreṣṭhabuddhatvam iṣṭaṃ jananamaraṇasarvakleśapāpeṣu rakṣā |
T06asmahsbu:949: anena tṛtīyena tasyaiva śaraṇatvasyānupamaśreṣṭhasya cānuttaryaṃ tenaivārthena darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:950: bauddhair dharmair yac ca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yat saddharme vetti sa satvān pravinetum |
T06asmahsbu:951: yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭham iha eṣyaṃ śaraṇānām || AMsa_9.10
T06asmahsbu:952: anena caturthena yaiḥ kāraṇais tat tathānuttaraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:954: svārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya saddharmasatvavinayopāyajñānāt karuṇāpāragamanāc ca parārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya |
T06asmahsbu:955: ālokāt kālāt sarvasatvānāṃ buddhatvaṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat |
T06asmahsbu:957: anena pañcamena ślokena yāvantaṃ kālaṃ yāvatāṃ satvānāṃ yatrārthe śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat samāsena darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:960: kleśajñeyavṛtīnāṃ satatam anugataṃ bījam utkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminn astaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:961: buddhatvaṃ śukladharmapravaraguṇayutā āśrayasyānyathāptis tatprāptir nirvikalpād viṣayasumahato jñānamārgāt suśuddhāt || AMsa_9.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:968: sthitaś ca tasmin sa tathāgato jagan mahācalendrastha ivābhyudīkṣate |
T06asmahsbu:969: śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghābhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā || AMsa_9.13
T06asmahsbu:971: tatstho hi mahācalendrastha iva dūrāntaranikṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ paśyati |
T06asmahsbu:972: dṛṣṭvā ca karuṇāyate śrāvakapratyekabuddhān api prāg eva tadanyān |
T06asmahsbu:973: pravṛttir ūddhittir avṛtir āśrayo nivṛttir āvṛttir atho dvayādvayā |
T06asmahsbu:974: samāviśiṣṭā api sarvagātmikā tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttir iṣyate || AMsa_9.14
T06asmahsbu:976: sā hi tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttiḥ parārthavṛttir iti pravṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:987: yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tat sarvagataṃ sadāmatam |
T06asmahsbu:988: yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tat satvagaṇeṣu sarvagam ||
T06asmahsbu:989: anena caturthena tatsvabhāvasya buddhatvasya sarvagatatvaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:991: satvagaṇeṣu sarvagatatvaṃ buddhatvasyātmatvena sarvasatvopagamane pariniṣpattito veditavyaṃ
T06asmahsbu:993: tatha duṣṭeṣu satveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate || AMsa_9.16 ||
T06asmahsbu:995: anena pañcamena sarvagatatve 'pyabhājanabhūteṣu satveṣu abuddhabimbadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntena sādhayati
T06asmahsbu:997: buddheṣv api tathā jñeyaṃ saṃdarśanamadarśanam || AMsa_9.17 ||
T06asmahsbu:998: anena ṣaṣṭhena buddhavineyeṣu satsu buddhotpādāt taddarśanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1002: tathā jine vinābhogaṃ deśanāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ || AMsa_9.18 ||
T06asmahsbu:1004: buddheṣv api vinābhogaṃ tathā kṛtyanidarśanam || AMsa_9.19 ||
T06asmahsbu:1005: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyām anābhogena buddhakāryaṃ sādhayaty aghaṭitatūryaśabdamaṇiprabhāvasādharmyeṇa
T06asmahsbu:1008: yathākāśe kriyāṇāṃ hi hānir abhyudayaḥ sadā |
T06asmahsbu:1011: ākāśa iva lokakriyāṇām avicchede 'pi cānyānyakriyodayavyayas tathaiva |
T06asmahsbu:1014: na śuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā || AMsa_9.22 ||
T06asmahsbu:1020: tatra cānāsrave dhātau buddhānāṃ paramātmā nirdiśyate |
T06asmahsbu:1023: agraṃ nairātmyaṃ viśuddhā tathatā sā ca buddhānām ātmā svabhāvārthena tasyāṃ viśuddhāyām agraṃ nairātmyam ātmānaṃ buddhā labhante śuddhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1024: ataḥ śuddhātmalābhitvāt buddhā ātmamāhātmyaṃ prāptā ity anenābhisaṃdhinā buddhānām anāsrave dhātau paramātmā vyavasthāpyate |
T06asmahsbu:1025: na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate |
T06asmahsbu:1027: tenaiva kāraṇena buddhatvaṃ na bhāva ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:1030: ato buddhasya bhāvābhāvapraśne bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇān na bhavatīty evamādir avyākṛtanayo mataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1031: dāhaśāntir yathā lohe darśane timirasya ca |
T06asmahsbu:1032: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate || AMsa_9.25 ||
T06asmahsbu:1033: yathā ca lohe dāhaśāntir darśane ca timiram etasya śāntir na bhāvo dāhatimirayor abhāvalakṣaṇatvāt
T06asmahsbu:1035: evaṃ buddhānāṃ cittajñāne ca dāhatimirasthānīyayo rāgāvidyayoḥ śāntir na bhāvaḥ śasyate tadabhāvaprabhāvitatvāc cetaḥprajñāvimuktyā nābhāvas tena tena vimuktilakṣaṇena bhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1036: buddhānām amale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca |
T06asmahsbu:1045: etau ratnākarameghopamatve pūrṇacandramahādityopamatve ca ślokau gatārthau
T06asmahsbu:1047: sadaikakāryā vartante lokam ālokayanti ca || AMsa_9.29 ||
T06asmahsbu:1054: bhānos tathaiva buddhānāṃ jñeyā jñānaviniḥsṛtiḥ || AMsa_9.31 ||
T06asmahsbu:1055: ekakāle sarvaraśmiviniḥsṛtyā sa ca buddhānām ekakāle jñānapravṛttiṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:1057: tathaiva buddhajñānānāṃ vṛttau nāsti mamāyitam || AMsa_9.32 ||
T06asmahsbu:1059: sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate || AMsa_9.33 ||
T06asmahsbu:1065: tathā buddhajñānānām āvaraṇaṃ satvānām ābhājanatvena duṣṭatā pañcakaṣāyātyutsadatayā |
T06asmahsbu:1068: yathā pāṃśuviśeṣeṇa vastre raṅgavicitratā kvacid avicitratā |
T06asmahsbu:1073: buddhānām etad uditaṃ raṅgair vākāśacitraṇā || AMsa_9.36 ||
T06asmahsbu:1074: etad anāsravadhātau buddhānāṃ trividhaṃ gāmbhīryam evam uktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1078: tat punar lakṣaṇagāmbhīryaṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ paramātmalakṣaṇam avyākṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vimuktilakṣaṇaṃ cārabhyoktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1079: karmagāmbhīryaṃ bodhipakṣādiratnāśrayatvakarma satvaparipācanakarma niṣṭhāgamanakarma dharmadeśanākarma nirmāṇādikṛtyakarma jñānapravṛttikarma avikalpanakarma citrākārajñānakarma jñānāpravṛttikarma vimuktisāmānyajñānaviśeṣakarma cārabhyoktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1080: seyamanāsrave dhātau niṣprapañcatvād ākāśopame gāmbhīryaprabhedadeśanā yathā raṅgair ākāśacitraṇī veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:1082: tathāgatatvaṃ tasmāc ca tadgarbhāḥ sarvadehinaḥ || AMsa_9.37 ||
T06asmahsbu:1083: sarveṣāṃ nirviśiṣṭā tathatā tadviśuddhisvabhāvaś ca tathāgataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1084: ataḥ sarve satvās tathāgatagarbhā ity ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:1090: ābhyāṃ tāvad dvābhyāṃ prabhāvotkarṣaviśeṣeṇa buddhānāṃ vibhutvaṃ darśayati
T06asmahsbu:1091: aprameyam acintyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ bauddham iṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:1092: yasya yatra yathā yāvat kāle yasmin pravartate || AMsa_9.40 ||
T06asmahsbu:1093: anena tṛtīyena prakāraprabhedagāmbhīryaviśeṣābhyāṃ katham aprameyaṃ kathaṃ vācintyam ity āha
T06asmahsbu:1094: yasya pudgalasyārthe tat pravartate yatra lokadhātau yathā tādṛśaiḥ prakārair yāvad alpaṃ (Msa 41) vā bahu vā yasmin kāle |
T06asmahsbu:1103: manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare nirvikalpe suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate |
T06asmahsbu:1107: arthaparāvṛttau udgraharparāvṛttau ca kṣetraviśuddhivibhutvaṃ paramaṃ labhyate yena yathākāmaṃ bhogasaṃdarśanaṃ karoti |
T06asmahsbu:1109: vikalpaparāvṛttau sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sarvakālam avyāghāte paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate
T06asmahsbu:1111: apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānām acale male pade || AMsa_9.45 ||
T06asmahsbu:1112: pratiṣṭhāparāvṛttāv apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate buddhānām anāsrave dhātau
T06asmahsbu:1116: maithunasya parāvṛttau dvayor buddhasukhavihāre ca dārā 'saṃkleśadarśane
T06asmahsbu:1120: ākāśasaṃjñāvyāvṛttau dvayor eva cintitārthasamṛddhau ca yena gaganagarbho bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:1125: tatra cāprameyaṃ vibhutvam acintyakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ buddhānām anāsrave dhātau veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1127: śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām
T06asmahsbu:1128: vrajaty evaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā na ca punar aśeṣaṃ dhruvam iha || AMsa_9.49 ||
T06asmahsbu:1129: anena yādṛśasya paripākasya nimittaṃ bhavati taddarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:1130: upacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca vimuktau paramatāyām anupacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca kuśalamūlopacaye |
T06asmahsbu:1131: apakvaḥ śubhavṛddhau paramatāṃ vrajanapākaṃ vrajati pakvaḥ suviśuddhau paramatāṃ vrajati |
T06asmahsbu:1132: evaṃ ca nityakālaṃ vrajati na ca niḥśeṣaṃ lokasyānantatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1133: tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ paramaguṇayogād bhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvam aśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam |
T06asmahsbu:1134: labhante yaddhīrā daśadig sadā sadā sarvasamayaṃ tad āścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇān nādbhutam api || AMsa_9.50 ||
T06asmahsbu:1135: anena dvitīyena paripakvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ paripākasyāścaryaṃ nāścaryaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1136: (Msa 43) lakṣaṇaṃ sadā sarvasamayam iti nityaṃ nirantaraṃ ca tad anubhūya
T06asmahsbu:1138: kvaciddharmāñ ca kaṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ bahumukhaśatair darśayati yaḥ kvacij janmāntardhiṃ kvacid api vicitrāṃ janacarīm |
T06asmahsbu:1139: kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacid api ca nirvāṇam asakṛt na ca sthānāt tasmād vicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute || AMsa_9.51 ||
T06asmahsbu:1143: na ca sthānāc calatīty anāsravād dhātoḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1144: na buddhānām evaṃ bhavati mama pakvo 'yam iti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca
T06asmahsbu:1146: vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacam upayāty eva janatā śubhair dharmair nityaṃ diśi diśi samantāt trayamukham anena caturthena tatparipākaprayoganimittatvam anabhisaṃskāreṇa daśayati |
T06asmahsbu:1148: yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadair aṃśavisaraiḥ prapākakaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte
T06asmahsbu:1149: tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte anena pañcamenānabhisaṃskāraparipācanadṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:1150: yathaikasmād dīpād bhavati sumahān dīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa
T06asmahsbu:1153: 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punar eti punar upaiti vyayamataḥ || AMsa_9.54 ||
T06asmahsbu:1156: yathā toyais tṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ
T06asmahsbu:1157: tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair na tṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryam iha tat || AMsa_9.55 ||
T06asmahsbu:1158: anena saptamena paripakvānāṃ vimuktipraveśe samudrodāharaṇena dharmadhātor atṛptiṃ cāvakāśadānād avṛddhiṃ dhyānādhikatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1167: eṣa hetvarthaṃ phalārthaṃ cārabhya dvitīyaḥ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1173: eṣa karmārthaṃ yogārthaṃ cārabhya tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1174: trividhiṃ kāyādinirmāṇaṃ karma samādhidhāraṇīmukhābhyāṃ dvayena cāprameyeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa samanvāgamo yogaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1182: kāyabhedā hi buddhānāṃ prathamas tu dvayāśrayaḥ || AMsa_9.60 ||
T06asmahsbu:1188: kṣetraiś ca nāmabhiḥ kāyair dharmasaṃbhogaceṣṭitaiḥ || AMsa_9.61 ||
T06asmahsbu:1189: tatra sāṃbhogikaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍalabuddhakṣetranām aśarīradharmasaṃbhogakriyābhir bhinnaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1190: samaḥ sūkṣmaś ca tacchiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1194: tena sāṃbhogikena kāyena saṃbaddhaḥ saṃbhogavibhutve ca hetur yatheṣṭaṃ bhogadarśanāya |
T06asmahsbu:1197: nairmāṇikas tu kāyo buddhānām aprameyaprabhedaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ sāṃbhogikaḥ svāthasaṃpattilakṣaṇaḥ
T06asmahsbu:1199: evaṃ dvayārthasaṃpattir yathākramaṃ dvayoḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ sāṃbhogike ca kāye nairmāṇike ca |
T06asmahsbu:1202: sa punar nirmāṇakāyaḥ sadā vineyārthaṃ śilpasya vīṇāvādanādibhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1204: nirvāṇasya ca darśanair vimocane mahopāyatvāt parārthasaṃpattilakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1205: tribhiḥ kāyais tu vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1206: sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho yas tribhiḥ kāyair nirdarśitaḥ || AMsa_9.65 ||
T06asmahsbu:1207: tribhiś ca kāyair buddhānāṃ sarvakāyasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1208: ebhis tribhiḥ kāyaiḥ sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho nidarśitaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1209: dvayoḥ svaparārthaprabhāvitatvāt dvayoś ca tadāśritatvād yathā pūrvam uktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1212: te ca trayaḥ kāyāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yathākramaṃ tribhir nirviśeṣā āśrayeṇa dharmadhātor abhinnatvāt āśayena pṛthak buddhāśayasyābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1214: teṣu ca triṣu kāyeṣu yathākramaṃ trividhā nityatā veditavyā yena nityakāyās tathāgatā ucyante
T06asmahsbu:1221: caturvidhaṃ buddhānāṃ jñānam ādarśajñānaṃ samatājñānaṃ pratyavekṣājñānaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:1222: ādarśajñānam acalaṃ trīṇi jñānāni tadāśritāni calāni |
T06asmahsbu:1224: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ na ca teṣv āmukhaṃ sadā || AMsa_9.68 ||
T06asmahsbu:1225: ādarśajñānam amamam aparicchinnaṃ deśataḥ sadānugaṃ kālataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1226: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ sadāvaraṇavigamāt na ca teṣv āmukham anākāratvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1230: teṣāṃ ca samatādijñānānāṃ sarvaprakārāṇāṃ hetutvāt sarvajñānānāmākaropamaṃ
T06asmahsbu:1234: yadbodhisatvenābhisamayakāleṣu samatājñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ tadbhāvanāśuddhito budhiprāptasyāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇe niviṣṭaṃ samatājñānamiṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:1237: mahāmaitrīkaruṇābhyāṃ sarvakālānugaṃ yathādhimokṣaṃ ca satvānāṃ buddhabimbanidarśakaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1238: yataḥ kecit satvās tathāgataṃ nīlavarṇaṃ paśyanti kecit pītavarṇam ity evamādi |
T06asmahsbu:1240: dhāraṇīnāṃ samādhīnāṃ nidhānopamam eva ca || AMsa_9.72 ||
T06asmahsbu:1246: kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu nirmāṇair nānāprakārair aprameyair acintyaiś ca sarvasatvārthakaraṃ
T06asmahsbu:1248: acintyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ tac ca sarvathā || AMsa_9.75 ||
T06asmahsbu:1249: tac ca buddhanirmāṇaṃ sadā sarvathā cācintyaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1260: eka eva buddha ity etann eṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:1266: puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravaiyarthyaṃ ca syād anyeṣāṃ bodhisatvānām anabhisaṃbodhān na ca yuktaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ
T06asmahsbu:1267: tasmād avaiyarthyād api naika eva buddhaḥ satvārthakriyāsākalyaṃ ca na syāt |
T06asmahsbu:1268: buddhasya buddhatve kasyacit apratiṣṭhāpanād etac ca na yuktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1270: vinā saṃbhāreṇa buddhatvāyogād vinā cānyena buddhena saṃsthānāyogād ity anāditvād apy eko buddho na yuktaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1271: bahutvam api neṣyate buddhānāṃ dharmakāyasyābhedād anāsrave dhātau |
T06asmahsbu:1274: sarvathā 'nupalambhaś ca upalambhaḥ paro mataḥ || AMsa_9.78 ||
T06asmahsbu:1275: yā parikalpitena svabhāvenāvidyamānatā saiva paramā vidyamānatā pariniṣpannena svabhāvena
T06asmahsbu:1276: yaś ca sarvathā 'nupalambhaḥ parikalpitasya svabhāvasya sa eva parama upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannasvabhāvasya
T06asmahsbu:1278: pratilambhaḥ paraś ceṣṭaḥ pratilambhaṃ ca paśyatām || AMsa_9.79 ||
T06asmahsbu:1279: saiva paramā bhāvanā yo bhāvanāyā anupalambhaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1280: sa eva paramaḥ pratilambho yaḥ pratilambhānupalambhaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1281: paśyatāṃ gurutvaṃ tāṃ dīrghaṃ nimittaṃ vīryam ātmanaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1282: mānināṃ bodhisatvānāṃ dūre bodhir nirūpyate || AMsa_9.80 ||
T06asmahsbu:1283: ye ca gurutvaṃ bahutvaṃ paśyanti adbhutadharmayuktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1286: ātmanaś ca vīryaṃ vayam ārabdhavīryā (Msa 59) buddhatvaṃ prāpsyāma iti |
T06asmahsbu:1287: teṣām evaṃ mānināṃ bodhisatvānām aupalambhikatvāt dūre bodhir nirūpyate |
T06asmahsbu:1290: kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat sarvam iti paśyatāṃ tasyāpi kalpanāmātrasyāvikalpanād akalpabodhisatvānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāvasthāyām arthataḥ prāptaiva bodhir ity ucyate
T06asmahsbu:1292: bhinnāśrayā bhinnajalāś ca nadyaḥ alpodakāḥ kṛtyapṛthaktvakāryāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1294: samudraviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarvā ekāśrayā ekamahājalāś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1295: miśraikakāryāś ca mahopabhogyā jalāśritaprāṇigaṇasya nityam || AMsa_9.83
T06asmahsbu:1296: bhinnāśrayā bhinnamatāś ca dhīrāḥ svalpāvabodhāḥ pṛthagātmakṛtyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1298: buddhatvaviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarve ekāśrayā ekamahāvabodhāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1299: miśrekakāryāś ca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi || AMsa_9.85 ||
T06asmahsbu:1314: uddānam ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1316: eṣa ca bodhyadhikāra ādim ārabhya yāvat bodhipaṭalānusāreṇānugantavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1318: jātājātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca |
T06asmahsbu:1319: abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca || AMsa_10.2
T06asmahsbu:1333: hāryā kīrṇā 'vyāvakīrṇā vipakṣair hīnodārā āvṛtā 'nāvṛtā ca |
T06asmahsbu:1334: yuktā 'yuktā saṃbhṛtā 'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:1372: avipraṇāśaḥ sthairyaṃ ca viśeṣagamanaṃ tathā || AMsa_10.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:1381: bhrāntikāyāmāmukhāyāṃ śrutamayādikāyāṃ ca yāvat madhyāyāṃ viśeṣagamanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1387: bhṛtyopamā svārthināṃ sā rājaprakhyā parārthinām || AMsa_10.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:1388: yathā śvā duḥkhārtaḥ satatam avitṛptaḥ kṣudhitako yathā kūrmaś cāsau jalavivarake saṃkucitakaḥ
T06asmahsbu:1390: yathā rājā rājñāṃ viṣaye vaśavartī viharati |
T06asmahsbu:1391: tathā kāmisthātṛsvaparajanakṛtyārtham udite viśeṣo vijñeyaḥ satatam adhimuktayā vividhayā
T06asmahsbu:1392: mahāyāne tasya vidhivad iha matvā paramatāṃ bhṛśaṃ tasmin dhīraḥ satatam iha tām eva vṛṇuyāt api khalu kāminām adhimuktiḥ śvasadṛśī laukikasamādhigatānāṃ kūrmaprakhyā svārthavatāṃ bhṛtyopamā
T06asmahsbu:1397: aprameyā yataḥ satvā layaṃ nāto 'dhivāsayet || AMsa_10.11 ||
T06asmahsbu:1403: yathā puṇyaṃ prasavate pareṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadat |
T06asmahsbu:1404: na tu svayaṃ sa bhuñjānas tathā puṇyamahodayaḥ || AMsa_10.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:1407: na tu svārthāśrayād dharmād deśitād upalabhyate || AMsa_10.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:1408: yathā bhojanaṃ dadataḥ puṇyam utpadyate parārthādhikārāt |
T06asmahsbu:1410: evaṃ parārthāśrayadeśitāt mahāyānadharmāt teṣu teṣu sūtreṣūktaḥ puṇyodayo mahāṃl labhyate
T06asmahsbu:1413: iti vipulagatau mahoghamahāryadharme janiya sadā matimān mahādhimuktim |
T06asmahsbu:1414: vipulasatatapuṇyatadvivṛddhiṃ vrajati guṇair asamair mahātmatāṃ ca ||
T06asmahsbu:1416: vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme 'pariṇīyayodārādhimuktyā matimān trividhaṃ phalaṃ parigṛhṇāti |
T06asmahsbu:1417: vipulapuṇyavṛddhiṃ tasyā evādhimukter vṛddhiṃ taddhetukāṃ cātulyaguṇamahātmatāṃ buddhatvaṃ
T06asmahsbu:1418: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre adhimuktyadhikāro daśamaḥ CHAPITRE XI ekādaśo 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:1419: dharmaparyeṣṭyadhikāre ālambanaparyeṣṭau catvāraḥ ślokāḥ piṭakatrayaṃ dvayaṃ vā saṃgrahataḥ kāraṇair navabhir iṣṭam |
T06asmahsbu:1422: tad eva trayaṃ hīnayānāgrayānabhedena dvayaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:1424: tatpunas trayaṃ dvayaṃ vā kenārthena piṭakam ity āha |
T06asmahsbu:1427: navabhiḥ kāraṇair vicikitsāpratipakṣeṇa sūtraṃ yo yatrārthe saṃśayitas tasya tanniścayārthaṃ deśanāt |
T06asmahsbu:1431: (Msa 54) punaḥ śikṣātrayadeśanā sūtreṇa adhiśīlādhicittasaṃpādanatā vinayena śīlavato
T06asmahsbu:1446: teṣāṃ jñānād dhīmān sarvākārajñatām eti || AMsa_11.2 ||
T06asmahsbu:1447: te ca sūtravinayābhidharmāḥ pratyekaṃ caturvidhārthāḥ samāsatas teṣāṃ jñānād bodhisatvaḥ sarvajñatāṃ prāpnoti |
T06asmahsbu:1448: śrāvakas tv ekasyā api gāthāyā artham ājñāyāsravakṣyaṃ prāpnoti |
T06asmahsbu:1449: āśrayato lakṣaṇato dharmād arthāc ca sūcanāt sūtram |
T06asmahsbu:1453: tatrāśrayo yatra deśe deśitaṃ yena yasmai ca |
T06asmahsbu:1457: abhimukhatvād abhīkṣṇatvād abhibhavanād abhigamanāc cābhidharmo veditavyaḥ
T06asmahsbu:1459: | abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmo 'bhidharma ekaikasya dharmasya rūpyarūpisanidarśanādiprabhedena bahulanirdeśāt
T06asmahsbu:1462: āpatter utthānād vyutthānān niḥsṛteś ca vinayatvam |
T06asmahsbu:1464: āpattitaḥ samutthānato vyutthānato niḥsaraṇataś ca veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1466: samutthānam āpattīnām ajñānāt pramādāt kleśaprācuryādanādarāc ca |
T06asmahsbu:1472: ajñānāt prasrabdhiḥ samagreṇa saṃghena śikṣāpadastha pratiprasrambhaṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:1478: prajñaptito yadā 'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃghaśikṣāṃ prajñāpayati |
T06asmahsbu:1479: pravibhāgato yaḥ prajñapte śikṣāpade tad uddeśasya vibhāgaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1480: viniścayataś ca tatrāpattiḥ kathaṃ bhavaty anāpattir veti nirdhāraṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:1482: ālambanaṃ mato dharmaḥ ādhyātmaṃ bāhyakaṃ dvayam |
T06asmahsbu:1483: lābho dvayor dvayārthena dvayoś cānupalambhataḥ || AMsa_11.5 ||
T06asmahsbu:1485: tatra grāhakabhūtaṃ kāyādikamādhyātmikaṃ grāhyabhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ tayor eva tathatādvayaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1486: tatra dvayor ādhyātmikabāhyayor ālambanayor dvayārthena lābho yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1487: yadi grāhyārthād grāhakārtham abhinnaṃ paśyati grāhakārthāc ca grāhyārthaṃ dvayasya punaḥ samastasyādhyātmikabāhyālambanasya tathatāyā lābhas tayor eva dvayor anupalambhād veditavyaḥ manojalpair yathoktārthaprasannasya pradhāraṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:1488: arthakhyānasya jalpāc ca nāmni sthānāc ca cetasaḥ || AMsa_11.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:1491: trividhālambanalābhaś ca pūrvoktas tat samāśritaḥ || AMsa_11.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:1492: dharmālambanalābhaḥ punas tribhir jñānair bhavati śrutacintābhāvanāmayaiḥ
T06asmahsbu:1493: | tatra samāhitena cetasā manojalpair yathoktārthaprasannasya tatpradhāraṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:1494: śrutamayena jñānena tallābhaḥ manojalpair iti saṃkalpaiḥ
T06asmahsbu:1498: yadi manojalpād evāyam arthaḥ khyātīti paśyati nānyan manojalpād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe
T06asmahsbu:1499: cittasya nāmni sthānāt bhāvanāmayena jñānena tallābho veditavyo dvayānupalambhād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe |
T06asmahsbu:1500: ata eva ca sa pūrvoktas trividhālambanalābho dharmālambanalābhasaṃniśrito veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1507: pañcadhā saptadhā caiva parijñā pañcadhā 'sya ca || AMsa_11.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:1511: yogināṃ hi manaskāra eṣa sarvātmako mataḥ || AMsa_11.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:1515: saṃbhinnālambano vibhinnālambanaḥ parijñāniyato bhāvanākārapraviṣṭaḥ śamathavipaśyanāmārgasvabhāvo 'nuśaṃsamanaskāraḥ pratīcchakaḥ prāyogikamanaskāro vaśavartimanaskāraḥ parīttamanaskāro vipulamanaskāraś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1523: jñānasaṃprayukto yo yogopaniṣad yogasahagataḥ sa punaryathākramaṃ śrutacintāmanyo bhāvanāmayaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1525: vibhinnālambanaḥ saptavidho nāmālambanaḥ padālambano vyañjanālambanaḥ pudgalanairātmyālambano dharmanairātmyālambano rūpidharmālambano
T06asmahsbu:1529: parijñāniyato yaḥ parijñeye vastuni parijñeye 'rthe parijñāyāṃ parijñāphale tatpravedanāyāṃ
T06asmahsbu:1537: tatra caturākārabhāvanaḥ pudgalanairātmyākārabhāvano dharmanairātmyākārabhāvano darśanākārabhāvano jñānākārabhāvanaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1546: sthitacittasya lokottarasaṃpattisaṃpratyayākārabhāvano yathā saṃpratyayākārabhāvana evaṃ vyavasāyākārabhāvano dharmāsaṃpramoṣākārabhāvanaś cittasthityākārabhāvanaḥ pravicayākārabhāvana indriyeṣu |
T06asmahsbu:1549: prāptiniścayākārabhāvanaḥ parikarmabhūmisaṃrakṣaṇākārabhāvanaḥ parasaṃprāptyākārabhāvana āryakāntaśīlapraviṣṭākārabhāvanaḥ saṃlikhitavṛttisamudācārakārabhāvanaḥ pūrvaparibhāvitapratilabdhamārgābhyāsākārabhāvano dharmasthitinimittāsaṃpramoṣākārabhāvano
T06asmahsbu:1554: pratīcchako yo dharmasrotasi buddhabodhisatvānām antikād avavādagrāhakaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1557: vṛttyupalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvividhāṃ vṛttim upalakṣayate parimāṇavṛttiṃ ca vyañjanānām aparimāṇavṛttiṃ ca nāmapadayoḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1558: parikalpopalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvayam upādāya dvayaparikalpam upalakṣayate |
T06asmahsbu:1559: nāmaparikalpam upādāyārthaparikalpam arthaparikalpamupādāya nāmaparikalpam aparikalpam akṣaraṃ
T06asmahsbu:1562: sa punar ekādaśavidho veditavya āgantukatvaprativedhataḥ saṃprakhyānanimittaprativedhato 'rthānupalambhaprativedhata
T06asmahsbu:1563: upalambhānupalambhaprativedhato dharmadhātuprativedhataḥ pudgalanairātmyaprativedhato dharmanairātmyaprativedhato hīnāśayaprativedhata udāramāhātmyāśayaprativedhato yathādhigamadharmavyavasthānaprativedhato vyavasthāpitadharmaprativedhataś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1566: tatvaṃ yat satataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ bhrānteś ca saṃniśrayaḥ śakyaṃ naiva ca sarvathābhilapituṃ yañ cāprapañcātmakam |
T06asmahsbu:1567: jñeyaṃ heyam atho viśodhyamamalaṃ yac ca prakṛtyā matam yasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśād viśuddhirmatā || AMsa_11.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:1568: satataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ tatvaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇenātyantamasatvāt
T06asmahsbu:1571: tatra prathamaṃ tatvaṃ parijñeyaṃ dvitīyaṃ praheyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ viśodhyaṃ cāgantukamalādviśuddhaṃ ca prakṛtyā yasya prakṛtyā viśuddhasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśād viśuddhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1573: na cāgantukamalāpagamād eṣāṃ viśuddhir neṣyata iti |
T06asmahsbu:1574: na khalu jagati tasmād vidyate kiṃcid anyaj jagad api tad aśeṣaṃ tatra saṃmūḍhabuddhi |
T06asmahsbu:1575: katham ayam abhirūḍho lokamohaprakāro yadasadabhiniviṣṭaḥ satsamantād vihāya || AMsa_11.14
T06asmahsbu:1577: na khalu tasmād evaṃlakṣaṇād dharmadhātoḥ kiṃcit anyal loke vidyate dharmatāyā dharmasyābhinnatvāt
T06asmahsbu:1582: yathā māyā yantraparigṛhītaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādikaṃ tathābhūtaparikalpaḥ paratantraḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1583: yathā māyākṛtaṃ tasyāṃ māyāyāṃ hastyaśvasuvarṇādyākṛtis tadbhāvena pratibhāsitā tathā tasminn abhūtaparikalpe dvayabhrāntirgrāhyagrāhakatvena pratibhāsitā parikalpitasvabhāvākārā veditavyā yathā tasmin na tadbhāvaḥ paramārthas tatheṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:1584: yathā tasyopalabdhis tu tathā saṃvṛtisatyatā || AMsa_11.16 ||
T06asmahsbu:1585: yathā tasmin na tadbhāvo māyākṛte hastitvādyabhāvas tathā tasmin paratantre paramārtha iṣyate parikalpitasya dvayalakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1586: yathā tasya māyākṛtasya hastyādibhāvenopalabdhis tathābhūtaparikalpasya saṃvṛtisatyatopalabdhiḥ
T06asmahsbu:1589: yathā māyākṛtyasyābhāve tasya nimittasya kāṣṭhādikasya vyaktir bhūtārthopalabhyate tathāśrayaparāvṛttau dvayabhrāntyabhāvād abhūtaparikalpasya bhūto 'rtha upalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:1590: tannimitte yathā loko hy abhrāntaḥ kāmataś caret |
T06asmahsbu:1591: parāvṛttāv aparyas taḥ kāmacārī tathā patiḥ yatiḥ || AMsa_11.18 ||
T06asmahsbu:1592: yathā tannimitte kāṣṭhādāv abhrānto lokaḥ kāmataś carati svatantras tathā
T06asmahsbu:1594: tadākṛtiś ca tatrāsti tadbhāvaś ca na vidyate |
T06asmahsbu:1597: eṣa śloko gatārthaḥ na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:1599: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo yas tadākṛtibhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1600: nābhāvo bhāva eva ca yo hastitvādyabhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1601: tayoś ca bhāvābhāvayor aviśeṣo māyādiṣu vidhīyate |
T06asmahsbu:1604: ya eva hastitvādyabhāvaḥ sa eva tadākṛtibhāvaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1605: tathā dvayābhatātrāsti tadbhāvaś ca na vidyate |
T06asmahsbu:1609: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:1616: ya eva hi ābhāsatāyā bhāvaḥ sa eva dvayasyābhāva iti |
T06asmahsbu:1618: hīnayānena yānasya pratiṣedhārtham eva ca || AMsa_11.23 ||
T06asmahsbu:1619: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ bhāvābhāvayor aikāntikatvam aviśeṣaś ceṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:1623: abhāvasya hy abhāvatvaṃ viditvā samāropaṃ na karoti |
T06asmahsbu:1625: tayoś cāviśeṣaṃ viditvā na bhāvād udvijayate tasmān na hīnayānena niryāti |
T06asmahsbu:1626: bhrānter nimittaṃ bhrāntiś ca rūpavijñaptir iṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:1627: arūpiṇī ca vijñaptir abhāvāt syān na cetarā || AMsa_11.24 ||
T06asmahsbu:1628: rūpabhrānter yā nimittavijñaptiḥ sā rūpavijñaptir iṣyate rūpākhyā |
T06asmahsbu:1630: abhāvād rūpāvijñapter itarāpi na syād arūpiṇī vijñaptiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1633: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate || AMsa_11.25 ||
T06asmahsbu:1635: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate || AMsa_11.26 ||
T06asmahsbu:1637: grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:1638: pratibimbaṃ saṃkalikāṃ ca manasikurvataḥ tadgrāhabhrānter dvayam udāhṛtaṃ pūrvavat |
T06asmahsbu:1640: sadasanto 'tha māyābhā ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇāḥ || AMsa_11.27 ||
T06asmahsbu:1641: ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇā vipakṣasvabhāvās te sadasanto māyopamāś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1646: tayoś ca bhāvābhāvayor aviśiṣṭatvāt santo 'pya santo
T06asmahsbu:1649: māyopamāś ca nirdiṣṭā ye dharmāḥ prātipakṣikāḥ || AMsa_11.28 ||
T06asmahsbu:1650: ye 'pi prātipakṣikā dharmā buddhenopadiṣṭāḥ smṛtyupasthānādayas te 'pyalakṣaṇā māyāś ca nirdiṣṭāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1651: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā 'bhāvād yathā bālair gṛhyante |
T06asmahsbu:1654: evam alakṣaṇā avidyamānāś ca khyānti tasmān māyopamāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1656: ye sarvadharmān paśyanti nirmārās te jinātmajāḥ || AMsa_11.29 ||
T06asmahsbu:1658: ye prātipakṣikā dharmās te māyārājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśaprahāṇe vyavadānādhipatyāt |
T06asmahsbu:1659: ye 'pi sāṃkleśikā dharmās te 'pi rājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśanirvṛttāv ādhipatyāt |
T06asmahsbu:1660: atas taiḥ prātipakṣikaiḥ saṃkleśaparājayo māyārājñeva rājñaḥ parājayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1665: ṣaṭ ṣaṭ dvau ca punaś ca ṣaṭ dvayamatā ekaikaśaś ca trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ khalu tatra tatra kathitā buddhair vibuddhottamaiḥ || AMsa_11.30 ||
T06asmahsbu:1666: yat tūktaṃ bhagavatā māyopamā dharmā yāvan nirmāṇopamā iti |
T06asmahsbu:1670: marīcikopamau dvau dharmo cittaṃ caitasikāś ca bhrāntikaratvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1671: pratibimbopamāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍ evādhyātmikāny āyatanāni pūrvakarmapratibimbatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1672: pratibhāsopamāḥ ṣaḍ eva bāhyāny āyatanāny ādhyātmikānām āyatanānāṃ chāyābhūtatvāt tadādhipatyotpattitaḥ
T06asmahsbu:1675: udakacandrabimbopamāḥ samādhisaṃniśritā dharmāḥ samādher udakasthānīyatvād acchatayā |
T06asmahsbu:1678: abhūtakalpo na bhūto nābhūto 'kalpa eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:1679: na kalpo nāpi cākalpaḥ sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirucyate || AMsa_11.31 ||
T06asmahsbu:1681: na bhūto nābhūto yas tadanukūlo yāvan nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1683: na kalpo (Msa 63) nāpi cākalpo lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1690: sahāvidyayā kleśaiś ca vṛttir eṣāṃ ta ime sāvidyākleśavṛttayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1694: ta eva hy advayābhāsā vartante carmakāṇḍavat || AMsa_11.33 ||
T06asmahsbu:1695: ālambanaviśeṣāptir iti yo dharmālambanalābhaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1696: svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhātur vikalpānāṃ tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāc cetasaḥ
T06asmahsbu:1698: bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva vikalpā advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya |
T06asmahsbu:1700: yathā hi kharatvāpagamāt tad eva carma mṛdu bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:1701: agnisaṃtāpanayā tad eva kāṇḍaṃ ṛju bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:1702: evaṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābhyāṃ cetaḥprajñāvimuktilābhe parāvṛttāśrayasya ta eva vikalpā na punar dvayābhāsāḥ pravartante ity eva vyavadānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1705: śraddhādyābhāsaṃ na tadanyo dharmaḥ kliṣṭakuśalo 'sti || AMsa_11.34 ||
T06asmahsbu:1706: cittamātram eva dvayapratibhāsam iṣyate grāhyapratibhāsaṃ grāhakapratibhāsaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:1709: na tu tadābhāsād anyaḥ kliṣṭo dharmo 'sti
T06asmahsbu:1712: iti cittaṃ citrābhāsaṃ citrākāraṃ pravartate || AMsa_11.35 ||
T06asmahsbu:1714: tatra cittam eva vastu tac citrābhāsaṃ (Msa 64) pravartate |
T06asmahsbu:1715: paryāyeṇa rāgābhāsaṃ vā dveṣābhāsaṃ vā tadanyadharmābhāsaṃ vā |
T06asmahsbu:1718: na tu dharmāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ tatpratibhāsavyatirekeṇa tallakṣaṇābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1721: lakṣyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ caiva lakṣaṇā ca prabhedataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1725: lakṣyam etat samāsena hy apramāṇaṃ prabhedataḥ || AMsa_11.37 ||
T06asmahsbu:1729: avikāritā asaṃskṛtam ākāśādikaṃ tadvijñapter nityaṃ tathāpravṛtteḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1730: ity etat samāsena pañcavidhaṃ lakṣyaṃ prabhedenāpramāṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1734: tatra parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ yathājalpārthasaṃjñāyā nimittaṃ tasya jalpasya vāsanā tasmāc ca vāsanādyo 'rthaḥ khyāti avyavahārakuśalānāṃ vināpi yathājalpārthasaṃjñayā |
T06asmahsbu:1736: tasyā yad ālambanaṃ tannimittam evaṃ yac ca parikalpyate yataś ca kāraṇād vāsanatas tad ubhayaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇamatrābhipretaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1737: yathā nāmārtham arthasya nāmnaḥ prakhyānatā ca yā |
T06asmahsbu:1739: aparaparyāyo yathā nāma cārthaś ca yathānāmārtham arthasya nāmnaś ca prakhyānatā yathānāmārthaprakhyānatā
T06asmahsbu:1740: yadi yathānāmārthaḥ khyāti yathārthaṃ vā nāma ity etad abhūtaparikalpālambanaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ etāvad dhi parikalpyate yad uta nāma vā artho veti |
T06asmahsbu:1755: pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ punas tathatā sā hy abhāvatā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ parikalpitā nābhāvatā ca tadabhāvatvena bhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1757: aśāntā cāgantukair upakleśaiḥ śāntā ca prakṛtipariśaddhatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1759: etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kleśavyavadānalakṣaṇam avikalpalakṣaṇaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:1762: cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ ca sadasattārthapaśyanā || AMsa_11.42 ||
T06asmahsbu:1764: ādhāra ādhānam ādarśa āloka āśrayaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1765: tatrādhāro niṣpandadharmo yo buddhenādhigamo deśitaḥ sa tasyādhigamasya niṣpandaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1767: ādarśaḥ cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ samādhir yad etat pūrvaṃ nāmni sthānam uktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1768: ālokaḥ sadasatvenārthadarśanaṃ lokottarā prajñā tathā sac ca sato yathābhūtaṃ paśyaty asaccāsataḥ
T06asmahsbu:1771: samaṃ viśiṣṭam anyūnānadhikaṃ lakṣaṇā matā || AMsa_11.43 ||
T06asmahsbu:1781: na ca tasyonatvaṃ saṃkleśapakṣanirodhe nādhikatvaṃ vyavadānapakṣotpāda ity eṣā (Msa 66) pañcavidhā yogabhūmir lakṣaṇā |
T06asmahsbu:1785: dhātur bījaparāvṛtteḥ sa ca sarvatragāśrayaḥ || AMsa_11.44 ||
T06asmahsbu:1787: padārthadehanirbhāsānāṃ vijñānānāṃ parāvṛttir anāsravo dhātur vimuktiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1789: caturdhā vaśitā vṛtter manasaś codgrahaś ca ca |
T06asmahsbu:1790: vikalpasyāvikalpe hi kṣetre jñāne 'tha karmaṇi || AMsa_11.45 ||
T06asmahsbu:1791: manasaś codgrahasya ca vikalpasya cāvṛtteḥ parāvṛtter ity arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1792: caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramam avikalpe kṣetre jñānakarmaṇoś ca |
T06asmahsbu:1794: dvidhaikasyāṃ tadanyasyām ekaikā vaśitā matā || AMsa_11.46 ||
T06asmahsbu:1795: sā ceyam acalādibhūmitraye caturdhā vaśitā veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:1799: tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāv ekaikā vaśitā sādhumatyaṃ jñānavaśitā pratisaṃvidviśeṣalābhāt |
T06asmahsbu:1801: viditvā nairātmyaṃ dvividham iha dhīmān bhavagataṃ samaṃ tac ca jñātvā praviśati sa tatvaṃ grahaṇataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1802: tatas tatra sthānān manasa iha na khyāti tad api tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya vigamaḥ aparo vimuktiparyāyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1803: dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ viditvā bhavatrayagataṃ bodhisatvaḥ samaṃ tac ca jñātvā dvividhinair ātmyaṃ parikalpitapudgalābhāvāt parikalpitadharmābhāvāt na tu sarvathaivābhāvataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1804: tatvaṃ praviśati vijñaptimātratāṃ grahaṇato grahaṇamātram etad iti |
T06asmahsbu:1805: tatas tatra tatvavijñaptimātrasthānān manasas tad api tatvaṃ na khyāti
T06asmahsbu:1807: tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya yo vigamaḥ pudgaladharmayor anupalambhāt |
T06asmahsbu:1808: ādhāre saṃbhārād ādhāne sati hi nāmamātraṃ paśyan |
T06asmahsbu:1809: paśyati hi nāmamātraṃ tatpaśyaṃs tac ca naiva paśyati bhūyaḥ || AMsa_11.48
T06asmahsbu:1811: ādhāra iti śrutau saṃbhārād iti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya pūrvasaṃbhāralābhāt |
T06asmahsbu:1812: ādhāne satīti yoniśomanaskāre nāmamātraṃ paśyann ity abhilāpamātram artharahitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1813: paśyati hi nāmamātram iti vijñaptimātraṃ nāma arūpiṇaś catvāraḥ skandhā iti kṛtvā tatpaśyaṃs tad api bhūyo naiva paśyaty arthabhāve tadvijñaptyadarśanād ity ayam anupalambho vimuktiḥ cittam etat sadauṣṭhulyam ātmadarśanapāśitam |
T06asmahsbu:1814: pravartate nivṛttis tu tad adhyātmasthiter matā || AMsa_11.49 ||
T06asmahsbu:1815: aparaprakāraś cittam etat sadauṣṭhulyaṃ pravartate janmasu |
T06asmahsbu:1818: nivṛttis tu tad adhyātmasthiter iti tasya cittasya citta evāvasthānād ālambanānupalambhataḥ
T06asmahsbu:1819: niḥsvabhāvatāparyeṣṭau ślokadvayaṃ svayaṃ svenātmanā 'bhāvāt svabhāve cānavasthiteḥ |
T06asmahsbu:1825: 'navasthitatvān niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ kṣaṇikatvād ity etattrividhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatrayānugaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:1826: grāhavat tadabhāvāc ca niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ tadabhāvād iti svābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:1827: yathā bālānāṃ svabhāvagrāho nityasukhaśacyāt to vā 'nyena vā parikalpitalakṣaṇena tathāsau svabhāvo nāsti tasmād api niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ dharmāṇām iṣyate |
