T06asmahsbu:2298: iyato gaṃgānadīvālikāsamānabuddhān paryupāsya mahāyāne 'vabodha utpadyata iti |
T06asmahsbu:2300: ye sukhāvatyāṃ praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropapatsyanta iti |
T06asmahsbu:2301: vimalacandraprabhasya ca tathāgatasya nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavaty unattarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti |
T06asmahsbu:2303: yatra bhagavān kvacid dānādi vivarṇayati anyatra varṇitavān |
T06asmahsbu:2307: yatra bhagavān kasyacid buddhasyādhikāṃ saṃpattiṃ varṇayati |
T06asmahsbu:2310: ye buddhabodhisatveṣv akāraṃ kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantīti |
T06asmahsbu:2313: kṛtsnadhātupuṣṭiḥ sarvamahāyānādhiṣṭhānāya dhātupuṣṭis tadāvaraṇavigamāt sarvatra mahāyāne 'dhimuktilābhataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2318: iti sugatirakhedavān kṛpāluḥ prathitayaśāḥ suvidhijñatām upetaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2319: bhavati sukathiko hi bodhisatvas tapati jane kathitair yathaiva sūryaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:2323: pañca kāraṇāni sukathikatvasya yenāviparītaṃ darśayati abhīkṣṇaṃ nirāmiṣacitta ādeyavākyavineyānurūpaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:2324: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre deśanādhikāro dvādaśaḥ CHAPITRE XIII trayodaśo 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:2328: yathārtham ājñāya dharmamājñāya dharmānudharmapratipanno bhavati sāmīcīpratipanno 'nudharmacārī tatsaṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:2338: evam arthajñaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sūtrādīnāṃ kolopamatāṃ jānāti |
T06asmahsbu:2342: etena dvividhena pārthagjanenārthadharmajñānena dvayaṃ nairātmyabhāvaṃ pratividhya yathākramaṃ tasya jñānasya pariniṣpattyarthaṃ pratipadyate |
T06asmahsbu:2345: ādibhūmau samaṃ sarvair bodhisatvais tadātmabhiḥ || AMsa_13.4 ||
T06asmahsbu:2346: tato jñānaṃ sa labhate lokottaramanuttaram iti |
T06asmahsbu:2348: ādibhūmau pramuditāyāṃ bhūmau samaṃ sarvair bodhisatvais tadātmabhir iti tadbhūmikair evaṃ sāmīcīpratipanno bhavati tadbhūmikabodhisatvasamatayā |
T06asmahsbu:2353: anudharmaṃ caraty evaṃ pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu || AMsa_13.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:2360: suyogo guṇavān deśo yatra dhīmān prapadyate || AMsa_13.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:2369: akhinno bodhisatvaś ca jñeyaḥ satpurūṣo mahān || AMsa_13.8 ||
T06asmahsbu:2375: saddharmālambanatayā susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratayā śamathādinimittānāṃ kālena kālaṃ bhāvanātayā alpamātrāsaṃtuṣṭitayā satyuttarakaraṇīye sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā ca |
T06asmahsbu:2377: samādher vicayasyāpi pūrve hi kṛtapuṇyatā || AMsa_13.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:2378: anena caturthena pūrvakṛtapuṇyatāṃ pañcavidhena hetutvena darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:2381: ārogyasamādhiprajñāhetutvena ca yata ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate |
T06asmahsbu:2384: tasmād rāgādayas teṣāṃ buddhair niḥsaraṇaṃ matāḥ || AMsa_13.11 ||
T06asmahsbu:2386: nāham anyatra rāgād rāgasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmy evaṃ dveṣān mohād iti |
T06asmahsbu:2388: yasmād dharmadhātuvinirmukto dharmo nāsti dharmatāvyatirekeṇa dharmābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:2389: tasmād rāgādidharmatāpi rāgādyākhyāṃ labhate sa ca niḥsaraṇaṃ rāgādīnām ity evaṃ tatrābhisaṃdhir veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2391: tasmāt saṃkleśanirdeśe sa saṃvid dhīmatāṃ mataḥ || AMsa_13.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:2396: yatas tān eva rāgādīn yoniśaḥ pratipadyate |
T06asmahsbu:2397: tato vimucyate tebhyas tenaiṣāṃ niḥsṛtis tataḥ || AMsa_13.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:2398: tān eva rāgādīn yoniśaḥ pratipadyamānas tebhyo vimucyate tasmāt parijñātās ta eva teṣāṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhavatīty ayam atrābhisaṃdhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2400: na khalu jinasutānāṃ bādhakaṃ duḥkhamugraṃ narakabhavanavāsaiḥ satvahetoḥ kathaṃcit |
T06asmahsbu:2401: śamabhavaguṇadoṣapreritā hīnayāne vividhaśubhavikalpā bādhakā dhīmatāṃ tu
T06asmahsbu:2402: na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti
T06asmahsbu:2411: yathaiva citre vidhivadvicitrite natonnataṃ nasti ca dṛśyate 'tha ca |
T06asmahsbu:2412: abhūtakalpe 'pi tathaiva sarvathā dvayaṃ sadā nasti ca dṛśyate 'the ca ||
T06asmahsbu:2413: yathaiva toye lutiṭite prasādite na jāyate sā punar acchatānyataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2414: malāpakarṣas tu sa tatra kevalaḥ svacittaśuddhau vidhir eṣa eva hi ||
T06asmahsbu:2415: mataṃ ca cittaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ sadā tadāgantukadoṣadūṣitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2417: dharmābhāvaś ca dharmopalabdhiś ceti trāsasthānaṃ niḥsaṃkleśatā ca dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyā viśuddhatā ca paścād iti trāsasthānaṃ bālānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2418: tadyathākramaṃ māyādisādṛśyenākāśasādṛśyena ca prasādhayaṃs tatas trāsaṃ pratiṣedhayati |
T06asmahsbu:2419: tathā citre natonnatasādṛśyena lutitaprasāditatoyasādṛśyena ca yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2421: yathā toyaṃ prakṛtyā prasannam āgantukena tu kāluṣyeṇa lutitaṃ bhavaty evaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraṃ matam āgantukais tu doṣair dūṣitam iti |
T06asmahsbu:2427: yathaikaputrake tasmāt sadā hitakaraṃ matam || AMsa_13.20 ||
T06asmahsbu:2428: satveṣu hitakāritvān naity āpattiṃ sa rāgajāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2429: dveṣo virudyate tvasya sarvasatveṣu satpathā || AMsa_13.21 ||
T06asmahsbu:2430: yathā kapotī svasutātivatsalā svabhāvakāṃs tān upaguhya tiṣṭhati |
T06asmahsbu:2431: tathāvidhāyaṃ pratigho virudhyate suteṣu tadvat sakṛpe 'pi dehiṣu ||
T06asmahsbu:2432: maitrī yataḥ pratighacittam ato viruddhaṃ śāntir yato vyasanacittam ato viruddhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2434: artho yato nikṛticittam ato viruddhaṃ lhādo yataḥ pratibhayaṃ na ca tato viruddhaṃ || AMsa_13.23
T06asmahsbu:2435: yat satveṣu bodhisatvasya prema so 'ca rāgo 'bhipretas tatkṛtām āpattiṃ teṣāṃ pratiṣedhayati
T06asmahsbu:2437: kapotīm udāharati tadbahurāgatvāt apatyasnehādhimātratayā sakṛpe bodhisatve dehiṣu satveṣu pratigho virudhyate |
T06asmahsbu:2438: bodhisatvānāṃ satveṣu maitrī bhavati vyasanaśāntiḥ arthadānaṃ hlādaś ca prītyutpādāt |
T06asmahsbu:2439: yata ime maitryādayas tata eva pratighacittaṃ viruddhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2443: āture ca yathā vaidyaḥ satveṣu pratipadyate || AMsa_13.24 ||
T06asmahsbu:2445: vaṇigyathā punaḥ puṇye kāmeṣu pratipadyate || AMsa_13.25 ||
T06asmahsbu:2447: pitā yathā sute bāle satvāheṭhe prapadyate || AMsa_13.26 ||
T06asmahsbu:2451: pratipattiryathā yasmin bodhisatvasya sā matā || AMsa_13.28 ||
T06asmahsbu:2465: paramavimalanirvikalpabuddhyā vrajati sa siddhim anuttamāṃ krameṇa ||
T06asmahsbu:2467: iti nirvikalpena dharmanairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya pratipatteś cāvikalpanā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhir veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:2468: dvayaparipācanaśodhaneṣu yukta iti satvānām ātmanaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:2469: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre pratipattyadhikāras trayodaśaḥ CHAPITRE XIV caturdaśo 'dhikāraḥ
T06asmahsbu:2472: saṃpūrṇaḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sāgaro vāribhiryathā || AMsa_14.1 ||
T06asmahsbu:2476: suvijñaḥ kalpacittaś ca bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate || AMsa_14.2 ||
T06asmahsbu:2484: sūtrādināmni bandhīyāc cittaṃ prathamato yatiḥ || AMsa_14.4 ||
T06asmahsbu:2486: vicārayet tadarthāṃś ca pratyātmayoniśaś ca saḥ || AMsa_14.5 ||
T06asmahsbu:2487: avadhṛtya ca tān arthān dharme saṃkalayet punaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2488: tataḥ kuryāt samāśastiṃ tadarthādhigamāya saḥ || AMsa_14.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:2490: sūtrageyādike dharme yatsūtrādināma daśabhūmikam ity evamādi tatra cittaṃ prathamato badhnīyāt
T06asmahsbu:2491: ebhis tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ ṣaṭ cittāny upadiṣṭāni |
T06asmahsbu:2492: mūlacittam anucaracittaṃ vicāraṇācittam avadhāraṇācittaṃ saṃkalanacittam āśāsticittaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:2495: tadyathā 'nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmyaṃ ca yoniśo na cety ādi |
T06asmahsbu:2496: anucaracittaṃ yena sūtrādīnāṃ nāmata ālambitānāṃ padaprabhedam anugacchati |
T06asmahsbu:2498: tatrārthaṃ caturbhir ākārair vicārayati gaṇanayā tulanayā mīmāṃsayā pratyavekṣaṇayā ca |
T06asmahsbu:2499: tatra gaṇanā saṃgrahaṇaṃ tadyathā rūpaṃ daśāyatanāny ekasya ca pradeśo vedanā ṣaḍ vedanākāyā ity evam ādi |
T06asmahsbu:2500: tulanā saṃkhyāvato dharmasya śamalakṣagrahaṇam anādhyāropān apavādataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2505: sārthatathā ca samastānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nirarthatayā ca vyastānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2506: avadhāraṇācittaṃ yena yathānucaritaṃ vicāritaṃ vā tannimittam avadhārayati |
T06asmahsbu:2507: saṃkalanacittaṃ tadyathā vicāritam arthaṃ mūlacitte saṃkṣipya paripiṇḍitākāraṃ vartate |
T06asmahsbu:2508: āśāsticittaṃ yadarthaṃ prayukto bhavati samā tatparipūryarthaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalārthaṃ vā bhūmipraveśārthaṃ vā viśeṣagamanārthaṃ vā tacchandasahagataṃ vartate |
T06asmahsbu:2509: cittam eva hy ālambanapratibhāsaṃ vartate na cittād anyad ālambanam astīti jānato vā cittamātram ajānato vā cittam evālambanaṃ nānyat |
T06asmahsbu:2515: yuganaddhaś ca vijñeyo mārgas tatpiṇḍitaṃ punaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2516: līnaṃ cittasya gṛhṇīyād uddhataṃ śamayet punaḥ || AMsa_14.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:2518: sātatyenātha satkṛtya sarvasmin yojayet punaḥ || AMsa_14.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:2519: ebhiś caturbhiḥ ślokair ekādaśa manaskārā upadiṣṭāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2531: avagamyāśu vikṣepaṃ tasmin pratiharet punaḥ || AMsa_14.11 ||
T06asmahsbu:2532: pratyātmaṃ saṃkṣipec cittam upary upari buddhimān |
T06asmahsbu:2533: tataś ca ramayec cittaṃ samādhau guṇadarśanāt || AMsa_14.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:2535: abhidhyā daurmanasyādīn vyutthitān śamayet tathā || AMsa_14.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:2538: ebhiś caturbhiḥ ślokair navākārayā cittasthityā sthityupāya upadiṣṭaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2539: cittaṃ sthāpayati saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati upasthāpayati damayati śamayati vyupaśamayaty ekotīkaroti cittaṃ samādadhātīti navākārāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2540: tataḥ sa tanukāṃ labdhvā praśrabdhiṃ kāyacetasoḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2541: vijñeyaḥ samanaskāraḥ punas tāns tāṃ sa vivardhayan || AMsa_14.15 ||
T06asmahsbu:2543: tāṃ śodhayann abhijñārtham eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ || AMsa_14.16 ||
T06asmahsbu:2545: pūjārtham aprameyāṇāṃ buddhāyāṃ śravaṇāya ca || AMsa_14.17 ||
T06asmahsbu:2547: karmaṇyatāṃ parām eti cetasas tadupāsanāt || AMsa_14.18 ||
T06asmahsbu:2548: eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ dhyāne iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2551: tato 'nuśaṃsān labhate pañca śuddhaiḥ sa pūrvagān |
T06asmahsbu:2552: viśuddhibhājanatvaṃ ca tato yāti niruttaraṃ || AMsa_14.19 ||
T06asmahsbu:2553: kṛtsnādau svalpadauṣṭhulya kāyo hi dravate 'sya pratikṣaṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2554: āpūryate ca praśrabdhyā kāyacittaṃ samantataḥ || AMsa_14.20 ||
T06asmahsbu:2557: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasya sarvathā |
T06asmahsbu:2558: karoti satataṃ dhīmān evaṃ hetuparigrahaṃ || AMsa_14.22 ||
T06asmahsbu:2564: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasyeti daśamyāṃ bhūmau paripūri rbuddhabhūmau viśuddhiḥ
T06asmahsbu:2565: eteṣāṃ pañcānām anuśaṃsānāṃ trayaḥ śamathapakṣā dvau vipaśyanāpakṣau veditavyau |
T06asmahsbu:2568: manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvārthān na prapaśyati || AMsa_14.23 ||
T06asmahsbu:2572: prahīno grāhyanivikṣepas tadā tasya bhavaty asau || AMsa_14.25 ||
T06asmahsbu:2574: ānantaryasamādhiṃ ca spṛśaty āśu tadā punaḥ || AMsa_14.26 ||
T06asmahsbu:2576: tathābhūto bodhisatvaḥ samāhitacitto manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvadharmān na paśyati svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇākhyān manojalpamātram eva khyāti |
T06asmahsbu:2578: ayaṃ sa āloko yam adhikṛtyoktaṃ kṣāranadyām |
T06asmahsbu:2579: āloka iti dharmanidhyānakṣānter etad adhivacanam iti |
T06asmahsbu:2580: sa tasyaiva dharmālokasya vivṛddhyartham āsthitakriyayā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārabhate |
T06asmahsbu:2592: jñeyāny uṣmagatādīni etāni hi yathākramaṃ || AMsa_14.27 ||
T06asmahsbu:2595: nirvikalpaṃ malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ || AMsa_14.28 ||
T06asmahsbu:2602: etena virajo vigatamalam ity uktaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:2604: ameyaiś cāsya sā kalpaiḥ suviśuddhiṃ nigacchati || AMsa_14.29 ||
T06asmahsbu:2606: dharmadhātoś ca samatāṃ pratividhya punas tadā |
T06asmahsbu:2610: dharmanairātmyena ca dharmasamatāṃ pratividhya sarvasatveṣu sadā ātmasamacittatāṃ pratilabhate
T06asmahsbu:2616: tadanyabodhisatvasamatayā ca yathā tair abhisamitaṃ tathābhisamayāt |
T06asmahsbu:2622: labdhvā darśanamārgo hi tadā tena nirūcyate || AMsa_14.33 ||
T06asmahsbu:2623: tasya grāhyagrāhakābhāvasya bhāvaṃ dharmadhātūn darśanaprahātavyaiḥ kleśair vimuktaṃ paśyati
T06asmahsbu:2625: prakṛtyā śūnyatāṃ jñātvā śūnyajña iti kathyate || AMsa_14.34 ||
T06asmahsbu:2627: sa ca bodhisatvaḥ śūnyajña ity ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:2630: tathā bhāvasya śūnyatā paratantrasya sa hi na tathābhāvo yathā kalpyate svena lakṣaṇena bhāvaḥ
T06asmahsbu:2635: abhūtaparikalpas tadapraṇidhānasya padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2636: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2638: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha bodhisatvasya sarveṣāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābho veditavyaḥ smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ
T06asmahsbu:2639: saṃskāramātraṃ jagad etya buddhyā nirātmakaṃ duḥkhivirūḍhimātraṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2640: vihāya yānarthamayātmadṛṣṭiḥ mahātmadṛṣṭiṃ śrayate mahārthāṃ || AMsa_14.37
T06asmahsbu:2641: vinātmadṛṣṭyā ya ihātmadṛṣṭir vināpi duḥkhena suduḥkhitaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:2642: sarvārthakartā na ca kārakāṅkṣī yathātmanaḥ svātmahitāni kṛtvā ||
T06asmahsbu:2643: yo muktacittaḥ parayā vimuktyā baddhaś ca gāḍhāyatabandhanena |
T06asmahsbu:2644: duḥkhasya paryantam apaśyamānaḥ prayujyate caiva karoti caiva ||
T06asmahsbu:2645: svaṃ duḥkham udvoḍhum ihāsamartho lokaḥ kutaḥ piṇḍitam anyaduḥkhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2646: janmaikam ālokayate gataṃ tvacinto viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:2647: yatprema yā vatsalatā prayogaḥ satveṣv akhedaś ca jinātmajānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2648: āścaryam etat paramaṃ bhaveṣu na caiva satvātmasamān abhāvāt || AMsa_14.41
T06asmahsbu:2649: ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ślokair darśanamārgalābhino bodhisatvasya māhātmyodbhāvanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2651: mahātmadṛṣṭir iti mahārthā yā sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittalābhātmadṛṣṭiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2653: vinātmadṛṣṭyā anarthamayyātmadṛṣṭir mahārthā yā vināpi duḥkhena svasaṃtānajena suduḥkhitā sarvasatvasaṃtānajena |
T06asmahsbu:2654: yo vimuktacitto darśanaprahātavyebhyaḥ parayā vimuktyānuttareṇa yānena |
T06asmahsbu:2655: baddhaś ca gāḍhāyatabandhanena sarvasatvasāṃntāniṃkena (Msa 96) duḥkhasya paryantaṃ na paśyati svadhātor anantatvād ākāśavat prayujyate ca duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai satvānāṃ karoti caiva tām aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2656: viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ sa hi saṃpiṇḍitasarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ yāval lokagatam udvoḍhuṃ samarthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2657: yā satveṣu bodhisatvasya priyatā yā ca hitasukhaiṣitā yaś ca tadarthaṃ prayogo yaś cittaprayuktasyākheda etat sarvam āścaryaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu |
T06asmahsbu:2668: yatra sthaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate || AMsa_14.46 ||
T06asmahsbu:2672: yathāvyavasthānaṃ ca lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ yena satvān paripācayati |
T06asmahsbu:2673: asaṃkhyeyadvayasya samāptau paścimāṃ bhāvanām āgamyāvasānagatām abhiṣikto vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ labhate |
T06asmahsbu:2676: sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuttarapadaṃ yatrastho yāvat saṃsāram abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ satvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate |
T06asmahsbu:2677: kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhaven mahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:2679: apracodyamānaḥ satataṃ ca saṃmukhaṃ tathāgatair dharmasumukhe vyavasthitaḥ
T06asmahsbu:2680: nigṛhya keśeṣv iva doṣagahvarāt nikṛṣya bodhau sa balān niveśyate ||
T06asmahsbu:2681: sa sarvalokaṃ suviśuddhadarśanair akalpabodhair abhibhūya sarvathā |
T06asmahsbu:2685: yo hi dharmamukhaśrotasy avavādaṃ labhate tasya nityaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:2687: yato 'syātyarthaṃ prasādaḥ prasādavegair āpyāyitacetasas tannityadarśanaṃ buddhānāṃ mahārthaṃ bhavati |

T06asmahsbu:2772: tatra dānaṃ viṣayeṣv asaktimārgas tyāgābhyāsena tatsaktivigamāt |
T06asmahsbu:2773: śīlaṃ tadāptivikṣepasaṃyameṣu bhikṣusaṃvarasthasya viṣayāprāptaye sarvakarmāntavikṣepāṇām apravṛtteḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2776: dhyānaṃ prajñā cāvaraṇaviśodhaneṣu mārgas tābhyāṃ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaviśodhanāt |
T06asmahsbu:2779: śikṣātrayam adhikṛtya ca ṣaḍ pāramitā jinaiḥ samākhyātāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2780: ādyā tisro dvedhā antyadvayatas tisṛṣv ekā || AMsa_16.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:2782: tatrādyā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā tisraḥ pāramitāḥ sasaṃbhārasaparivāragrahaṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:2783: dānena hi bhoganirapekṣaḥ śīlaṃ samādatte samāttaṃ ca kṣāntyā rakṣaty ākruṣṭāpratyākrośanādibhiḥ
T06asmahsbu:2784: dvidhety adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣā sā antena dvayena saṃgṛhītā yathākramaṃ dhyānena prajñayā ca |
T06asmahsbu:2785: tisṛṣv api śikṣāsv ekā vīryapāramitā veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:2788: dānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |

T06asmahsbu:2793: satvaparipācakaṃ tredhā dānena satvān saṃgṛhya triṣu yāneṣu yathābhavyaniyojanāt |
T06asmahsbu:2794: śīlaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsbu:2799: vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena |
T06asmahsbu:2801: dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsbu:2803: prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena |

T06asmahsbu:2806: eṣāṃ tu vipakṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ krodhaḥ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepo dauṣprajñyaṃ yathākramaṃ |

T06asmahsbu:2817: hīnaṃ hi dānam utkṛṣṭaṃ śīlam evaṃ yāvad dhīnaṃ dhyānam utkṛṣṭā prajñeti |

T06asmahsbu:2850: samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayitavyas tam anena paryāyeṇa pratipādayet |
T06asmahsbu:2853: na ca bodhisatva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātram api hāpayati |
T06asmahsbu:2857: muditataraś ca bodhisatvo bhavati tān satvān dānena tathānugṛhṇan |
T06asmahsbu:2858: na tv eva te satvās tena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti |
T06asmahsbu:2859: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2860: upakārakatarāṃś ca sa bodhisatvas tān satvān ātmanaḥ samanupaśyati |
T06asmahsbu:2865: na ca bodhisatvaḥ satveṣu tathā vipulam api dānamayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā artho bhavati vipākena vā iti |
T06asmahsbu:2866: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2867: yadbodhisatvas tathā vipulasyāpi (Msa 103) dānaskandhasya vipākam satveṣv
T06asmahsbu:2869: sarvasatvasādhāraṇaṃ ca kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati iti |
T06asmahsbu:2870: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2871: tatra bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām atṛptāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:2872: yad bodhisatvo gaṃgānadīvālikāsameṣv ātmabhāveṣu gaṃgānadīvālikāsamakalpāyuṣpramāṇeṣu sarvāupakaraṇanirantaravighātī trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāv agnipratipūrṇe caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayann ekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayed etena paryāyeṇa yāvāṃś chīlaskandho yāvān ca prajñāsakandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate śīlaskandhaṃ yāvat prajñāskandhaṃ bhāvayed atṛpta eva bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyām āśayo yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām āśaya iti |
T06asmahsbu:2873: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyām atṛptāśayo yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām āśayaḥ |

T06asmahsbu:2875: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ |

T06asmahsbu:2886: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ |

T06asmahsbu:3057: tyaktaṃ buddhasutaiḥ svajīvitam api prāpyārthinaṃ sarvadā kāruṇyāt parato na ca pratikṛtir neṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prārthitaṃ |

T06asmahsbu:3068: kṣāntaṃ buddhasutaiḥ suduṣkaramatho sarvāpakāraṃ nṛṇāṃ na svargārtham asaśaktimato na ca bhayān naivopakārekṣaṇāt |

T06asmahsbu:3071: kṣāntyānuttarayā caiti duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntyā ca parāpakāramarṣaṇakṣāntyā ca yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3072: vīryaṃ buddhasutaiḥ kṛtaṃ nirūpamaṃ saṃnāhayogātmakaṃ hantuṃ kleśagaṇaṃ svato 'pi parataḥ prāptuṃ ca bodhiṃ parāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3073: vīryeṇaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā vīryaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam || AMsa_16.39 ||
T06asmahsbu:3077: dhyānaṃ buddhasutaiḥ samādhibahulaṃ saṃpāditaṃ sarvathā śreṣṭhair dhyānasukhair vihṛtya kṛpayā hīnāpapattiḥ śritā |
T06asmahsbu:3078: dhyānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dhyānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam || AMsa_16.40 ||
T06asmahsbu:3081: jñātaṃ buddhasutaiḥ satatvam akhilaṃ jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathā saktir naiva ca nirvṛtau prajanitā buddhaiḥ kutaḥ saṃvṛtau |
T06asmahsbu:3082: jñānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā jñānaṃ satvaparigraheṇa punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam || AMsa_16.41 ||
T06asmahsbu:3085: jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathety anantasvasaṃketādilakṣaṇabhedabhinnaṃ yad ajñeyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3087: jñānasya punaḥ satvaparigraheṇa karuṇayā satvānām aparityāgāt |
T06asmahsbu:3088: eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇāṃ ślokānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saptamena ślokena nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3090: dānādīnāṃ samas taṃ hi jñeyaṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam || AMsa_16.42 ||
T06asmahsbu:3095: caturthenākṣayatā ity eṣāṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam ebhiḥ ślokair veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3097: abhibhavati sa tāṃ dātā kṛpālurādhikyayogena || AMsa_16.43 ||
T06asmahsbu:3098: yācanake hi jane dāyakadarśanāt tataś ca yathā-īpsitaṃ labdhvā manorathaparipūraṇādyā tuṣṭir utpadyate |
T06asmahsbu:3100: āśāstiś ca yā taddarśane manorathaparipūraṇe ca |
T06asmahsbu:3101: sā bodhisatvasyādhikotpadyate (Msa 110) sarvakālaṃ yācanakadarśanāt tanmanorathaparipūraṇāc ca |
T06asmahsbu:3103: ato dātā kṛpālus tāṃ sarvam abhibhavaty ādhikyayogāt |
T06asmahsbu:3105: āmodate nikāmaṃ tadviratiṃ pālayātra katham || AMsa_16.44 ||
T06asmahsbu:3109: mithyāvādaṃ brūyāt paropaghātāya katham āryaḥ || AMsa_16.45 ||
T06asmahsbu:3122: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu samaṃ hitakāmaḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ mitrabhedārthaṃ paiśunyaṃ kariṣyatīti
T06asmahsbu:3124: paraduḥkhotpādane cātyarthaṃ bhīruḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhotpādanārthaṃ paruṣaṃ vakṣyati
T06asmahsbu:3125: satvānāṃ vinaye samyakprayuktaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ kariṣyati tasmād asau suvidūre trividhavāgdoṣāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpāc ca |
T06asmahsbu:3127: adhivāsayet katham asau sarvākāraṃ manaḥ kleśam || AMsa_16.47 ||
T06asmahsbu:3130: upakarasaṃjñāmodaṃ hy apakāriṇiparahita saṃjñāṃparahite sadā duḥkhe |
T06asmahsbu:3131: labhate yadā kṛpāluḥ kṣamitavyaṃ tasya kiṃ na syāt || AMsa_16.48 ||
T06asmahsbu:3135: duṣkaracaraṇāt sakṛpe hy aduṣkaraṃ vīryaṃ || AMsa_16.49 ||
T06asmahsbu:3137: tatra sakṛpe yat parārthaṃ duṣkaracaraṇād vīrthaṃ tadaduṣkaraṃ ca suduṣkaraṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:3142: yad evaṃ parasaṃjñāpagataṃ ca svatodhikatarasnehaṃ ca tadvīryaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3143: alpasukhaṃ hy ātmasukhaṃ līnaṃ parihāṇikaṃ kṣayi samohaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3144: dhyānaṃ mataṃ trayāṇāṃ viparyayād bodhisatvānām || AMsa_16.50 ||
T06asmahsbu:3146: līnaṃ laukikānāṃ satkāye śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca nirvāṇe |
T06asmahsbu:3147: parihāṇikaṃ laukikānāṃ kṣayi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe tatkṣayāt |
T06asmahsbu:3149: bodhisatvānāṃ punar dhyānaṃ bahusukham ātmaparasukham alīnamaparihāṇikam akṣayyasamohaṃ ca
T06asmahsbu:3150: āmoṣais tamasi yathā dīpair nunnaṃ tathā trayajñānaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3152: yathā hastāmoṣais tamasi jñānaṃ parīttaviṣayamapratyakṣam avyaktaṃ ca tathā pṛthagjanānāṃ
T06asmahsbu:3153: yathāvacarake dīpairjñānaṃ prādeśikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nātinirmalaṃ tathā śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:3154: yathā dinakarakiraṇair jñānaṃ samantāt pratyakṣaṃ sunirmalaṃ ca tathā bodhisatvānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3157: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam || AMsa_16.52 ||
T06asmahsbu:3165: jñānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ yena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dātṛdeyapratigrāhakāvikalpanāt
T06asmahsbu:3167: arthī duḥkhito niḥpratisaraṇo duścaritacārī guṇavāṃś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3175: samādhir ādir yathā tatraiva vibhutvam uktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3178: yaś ca dadāti yac ca yena ca yasmai ca yataś ca yasya ca parigraheṇa yatra ca yāvat prakāraṃ tad dānaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3180: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam || AMsa_16.53 ||
T06asmahsbu:3182: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam || AMsa_16.54 ||
T06asmahsbu:3184: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam || AMsa_16.55 ||
T06asmahsbu:3186: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca parā matā || AMsa_16.56 ||
T06asmahsbu:3195: priyaṃ syād bodhisatvānāṃ prāg eva tadviparyayāt || AMsa_16.57 ||
T06asmahsbu:3196: yadi bodhisatvānāṃ dānam ekasyaiva satvasya sukhadaṃ syād ātmanaś ca bahukalpavighātakṛt |
T06asmahsbu:3197: tathāpi tat teṣāṃ priyaṃ syāt karuṇāviśeṣāt kiṃ punar yad anekasatvasukhaṃ ca bhavatyā tmanaś ca bahukalpānugrahakṛt |
T06asmahsbu:3198: yad artham icchanti dhanāni dehinas tadeva dhīrā visṛjanti dehiṣu |
T06asmahsbu:3199: śarīrahetor dhanam iṣyate janais tad eva dhīraiḥ śataśo visṛjyate ||
T06asmahsbu:3202: śarīram evotsṛjato na duḥkhyate yadā manaḥ kā draviṇe 'vare kathā |
T06asmahsbu:3203: tadasya lokottaram iti yan mudaṃ sa tena tat tasya tad uttaraṃ punaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:3204: atra śarīram evāutsṛjato yadā mano na duḥkhyate tadasya lokottaram iti saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3205: eti yan mudaṃ sa tena duḥkhena tat tasya taduttaram iti tasmāl lokottarād uttaraṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3207: sarvastidānena yatheha dhīmān tuṣṭiṃ vrajaty arthijanasya tuṣṭyā ||
T06asmahsbu:3210: saṃpūrṇabhogo na tathāstimantam ātmānam anvīkṣati yācako 'pi |
T06asmahsbu:3211: sarvastidānād adhano 'pi dhīmān ātmānam anveti yathāstimantaṃ ||
T06asmahsbu:3212: suvipulam api vittaṃ prāpya naivopakāraṃ vigaṇayati tathārthī dāyakāl lābhahetoḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3213: vidhivad iha sudānair arthinas tarpayitvā mahadupakarasaṃjñāṃ teṣu dhīmān yathaiti || AMsa_16.62
T06asmahsbu:3216: svayam apagataśokā dehinaḥ svastharūpā vipulam api gṛhītvā bhuñjate yasya vittaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3217: pathi paramaphalāḍhyād bhogavṛkṣād yathaiva pravisṛtir atibhogī bodhisatvān na so 'nyaḥ || pravisṛtir atibhogaś cāsyeti pravisṛtir atibhogī sa ca nānyo bodhisatvād veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3229: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye tanniśritas tasya yato 'nulābhaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3230: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatāṃ ca siddhiḥ || AMsa_16.65
T06asmahsbu:3231: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvaśuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvakuśaladharmaprādhānyaṃ vīryasya nirdiṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3234: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatā ca siddhir iti karma nirdiṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3236: sarvā ca lokottarā siddhir laukikī ca kriyate |
T06asmahsbu:3237: vīryāvad avāptaṃ bhavabhogam iṣṭaṃ vīryeṇa śuddhiṃ prabalām upetāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3238: vīryeṇa satkāyam atītya muktā vīryeṇa bodhiṃ paramāṃ vibuddhāḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:3243: punar mataṃ hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ mokṣādhipaṃ pakṣavipakṣam anyat |
T06asmahsbu:3244: tattve praviṣṭaṃ parivartakaṃ ca vīryaṃ mahārthaṃ ca niruktam anyat ||
T06asmahsbu:3245: saṃnāhavīryaṃ prathamaṃ tataś ca prayogavīryaṃ vidhivatprahitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3246: alīnam akṣobhyam atuṣṭivīryaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ pravadanti buddhāḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:3248: tatra hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ samyakprahāṇeṣu ca dvayoḥ kuśaladharmābhivṛddhaye |
T06asmahsbu:3262: sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv ity ucyate yathākramaṃ
T06asmahsbu:3266: yānatraye prayukto yo janas tadāśrayeṇa yathākramaṃ nikṛṣṭamadhyottamaṃ vīryaṃ veditavyaṃ
T06asmahsbu:3269: līno hi buddhyāśayo yānadvaye prayuktānāṃ kevalātmārthādhikārāt |
T06asmahsbu:3271: ata eva yathākramaṃ vīryaṃ ta dalpārthaṃ mahārtham iva svārthādhikārāc ca |
T06asmahsbu:3272: na vīryavān bhogaparājito 'sti no vīryavān kleśaparājito 'sti |
T06asmahsbu:3273: na vīryavān khedaparājito 'sti no vīryavān prāptiparājito 'sti ||
T06asmahsbu:3275: caturvidho dānādīnāṃ vibandho yena dānādiṣu na pravartate |
T06asmahsbu:3282: anyonyaṃ saṃgrahataḥ prabhedato dharmato nimittāc ca |
T06asmahsbu:3283: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ viniścayaḥ sarvathā jñeyaḥ || AMsa_16.71 ||
T06asmahsbu:3285: abhayapradānena śīlakṣāntisaṃgraho yasmāt tābhyām abhayaṃ dadāti |
T06asmahsbu:3286: dharmadānena dhyānaprajñayor yasmāt tābhyāṃ dharmaṃ dadāti |
T06asmahsbu:3291: dānaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ dānadānaṃ śīladānaṃ yāvat prajñādānaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3294: ye sūtrādayo yeṣu dānādiṣv artheṣu saṃdṛśyante |
T06asmahsbu:3295: ye ca dānādayo yeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante |
T06asmahsbu:3300: śīlam api dānādīnāṃ bhikṣusaṃvarasamādānaṃ sarvasvaparigrahatyāgāc chīlapratiṣṭhitasya ca kṣāntyādiyogāt |
T06asmahsbu:3310: dānaṃ samam iṣyate yathā pāramitāsu priyākhyānaṃ taddeśanā |
T06asmahsbu:3312: tac chabdena pāramitānāṃ grahaṇāt pāramitādeśanā pāramitāsamādāpanety arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3313: samānārthatā yatra paraṃ samādāpayati tatra svayam anuvṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3314: kim arthaṃ punar etāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūnīṣyante |
T06asmahsbu:3325: yathāvāditathākāriṇaṃ hi samādāpakaṃ viditvā yatra kuśale tena pravartitāḥ pare bhavanti tad anuvartante |
T06asmahsbu:3335: yad apy anyat saṃgrahavastudvayam uktaṃ bhagavatā āmiṣasaṃgraho dharmasaṃgrahaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3336: tābhyām etāny eva (Msa 117) catvāri saṃgrahavastūni saṃgṛhītāni |
T06asmahsbu:3342: abandhyaḥ sarvathā caiva jñeyo hy ākārabhedataḥ || AMsa_16.76 ||
T06asmahsbu:3344: tatra hīnamadhyottamaḥ saṃgraho bodhisatvānāṃ yānatrayaprayukteṣu veditavyo yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3347: avandhyaḥ sarvathā aṣṭamyādiṣu bhūbhiṣu satvārthasyāvaśyaṃ saṃpādanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3349: sarvārthasiddhau sarveṣāṃ sukhopāyaś ca śasyate || AMsa_16.77 ||
T06asmahsbu:3350: ye kecit parṣatkarṣaṇe prayuktāḥ sarvais tair ayam evopāyaḥ samāśrito yaduta catvāri saṃgrahavastūni
T06asmahsbu:3351: tathā hi sarvārthasiddhaye sarveṣāṃ sukhaś caiṣa upāyaḥ praśasyate buddhaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3353: sarve ta evaṃ tasmāc ca vartma tat satvapācane || AMsa_16.78 ||
T06asmahsbu:3354: etena lokatraye 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ paripācane caturṇāṃ saṃgrahavastūnām ekāyanamārgatvaṃ darśayati
T06asmahsbu:3358: etena yathoktāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitasya bodhisatvasya saṃgrahavastuprayoga darśayati svaparārthasaṃpādanāt pāramitābhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiś ca yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3368: upadheś cittataś cānyā adhimukter nidhānataḥ || AMsa_17.3 ||
T06asmahsbu:3370: vastvābhogāvabodhāc ca vimukteś ca tathātvataḥ || AMsa_17.4 ||
T06asmahsbu:3373: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā || AMsa_17.5 ||
T06asmahsbu:3384: tathoktaiś cādhimuktyādibhir yad uta mahāyānadharmādhimuktaḥ bodhicittotpādataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3385: praṇidhānam eva hi nidhānam atroktaṃ ślokavattvānurodhāt |
T06asmahsbu:3394: tathā tv ato mahābodhiprāpter ity ayaṃ pūjāyāḥ prakārabhedaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3395: hetutaḥ phalataś caiva ātmanā ca parair api |
T06asmahsbu:3396: lābhasatkārataś caiva pratipatter dvidhā ca sā || AMsa_17.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:3398: parīttā mahatī pūjā samānāmānikā ca sā |
T06asmahsbu:3399: prayogād gatitaś caiva praṇidhānāc ca sā matā || AMsa_17.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:3401: tatrātītā hetuḥ pratyutpannā phalaṃ pratyutpannā hetur anāgatā phalam ity evaṃ hetuphalato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:3406: punaḥ samānā hīnā nirmānā praṇītā trimaṇḍalāvikalpanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3411: punar yāṃ pūjām āyatyāṃ prayojayituṃ praṇidadhāti sā dūre yāṃ praṇihitaḥ kartuṃ sāntike |
T06asmahsbu:3412: katamā punar buddhapūjā paramā veditavyety āha |
T06asmahsbu:3413: buddheṣu pūjā paramā svacittāt dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvāt |
T06asmahsbu:3415: ity ebhiḥ pañcabhir ākāraiḥ svacittapūjā buddheṣu paramā veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:3419: atṛptavipulam uditopakaranirlepakalyāṇāśayaiś ca ye pāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3426: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā || AMsa_17.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:3427: mitraṃ śrayed dāntaśamopaśāntaṃ guṇādhikaṃ sodyamam āgamāḍhyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3428: prabuddhatatvaṃ vacas ābhyupetaṃ kṛpātmakaṃ khedavivarjitaṃ ca ||
T06asmahsbu:3433: guṇair adhikaṃ na samaṃ vā nyūnaṃ vā |
T06asmahsbu:3440: satkāralābhaiḥ paricaryayā ca seveta mitraṃ pratipattitaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3443: dharme tathājñāśaya eva dhīmān mitraṃ pragacchet samaye nataś ca ||
T06asmahsbu:3448: satkāralābheṣu gataspṛho 'sau prapattaye taṃ pariṇāmayec ca |
T06asmahsbu:3449: iti pariṇāmanā pratipattyarthaṃ sevanān na lābhasatkārārthaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3450: yathānuśiṣṭapratipattitaś ca saṃrādhayec cittam ato 'sya dhīraḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:3454: yānatraye kauśalam etya buddhyā svasyaiva yānasya yateta siddhau |
T06asmahsbu:3456: satvān ameyān paripācanāya kṣetrasya śuddhasya ca sādhanāya || AMsa_17.13
T06asmahsbu:3458: aprameyāś ca satvāḥ pariśuddhaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3461: dharmeṣu dāyād aguṇena yukto naivāmiṣeṇa pravesat sa mitram |
T06asmahsbu:3465: ata ūrdhvamadhyardhena ślokena prakārabhedaḥ sevāyā veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3466: hetoḥ phalād dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ bahitaś ca dhīmān ||
T06asmahsbu:3468: hetoḥ phalād ity atītādibhedataḥ pūrvavat dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ (Msa 121) bahitaś ca dhīmān ity ādhyātmikabāhyabhedaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3469: dharmamukhasroto hi dharmamukhānuyānaṃ bahirdhā bahitaḥ śrutaśravāc cetasi yogataś cety audārikasūkṣmabhedaḥ
T06asmahsbu:3473: gatiprayogapraṇidhānataś ca kalyāṇamitraṃ hi bhajet dhīmān || AMsa_17.15
T06asmahsbu:3475: katamā punaḥ paramā seveti saptamaḥ ślokaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3480: brāhmā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatāś ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsbu:3492: punaḥ katamasmin satvanikāye dharme vā pravartante |
T06asmahsbu:3494: saukhyārthini duḥkhārte sukhite kliṣṭe ca te pravartante |
T06asmahsbu:3495: taddeśite ca dharme tat tathatāyāṃ ca dhīrāṇām || AMsa_17.18 ||
T06asmahsbu:3496: satvālambanāḥ sukhārthini yāvat kliṣṭe satvanikāye pravartante |
T06asmahsbu:3504: te hy avikalpatvād anālambanā ivety anālambanāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3507: karmadvayād anālambā maitrī kleśakṣayād api || AMsa_17.19 ||
T06asmahsbu:3509: ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇair anālambanā maitrī veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:3517: manomayānāṃ granthānāṃ prahāṇād ucchidyate ālambanam iti vacanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3518: te niścalāś ca calāś ca kṛpaṇair āsvāditā na ca jñeyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3519: te ca brāhmyā vihārāś caturvidhā veditavyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3529: hīnāśayāḥ samānā hīnās te hy anyathā tv adhikāḥ || AMsa_17.21 ||
T06asmahsbu:3539: anyathā tv adhikā iti yathoktaviparyayeṇādhimātratā veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:3540: brāhmyair vihṛtavihāraḥ kāmiṣu saṃjāyate yadā dhīmān |
T06asmahsbu:3541: saṃbhārān pūrayate satvāṃś ca vipācayati tena || AMsa_17.22 ||
T06asmahsbu:3542: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyai rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇa |
T06asmahsbu:3543: tatpratyayair api bhṛśair na yāti vikṛtiṃ pramatto 'pi || AMsa_17.23 ||
T06asmahsbu:3545: tatra brāhmyair vihṛto vihārair iti hetuḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3549: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyair vihārair jāyata iti niṣpandaphalaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3550: rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇeti visaṃyogaphalaṃ bhṛśair api tatpratyayair avikṛtigamanaṃ liṅgaṃ
T06asmahsbu:3554: yukto hi bodhisatvo bahuvidham ādīnavaṃ spṛśati || AMsa_17.24 ||
T06asmahsbu:3560: kleśair hantyātmānaṃ satvān upahanti śīlam upahanti |
T06asmahsbu:3563: prāptāprāptavihīno manasi mahad duḥkham āpnoti || AMsa_17.26 ||
T06asmahsbu:3564: tatra prathamais tribhiḥ padair ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāyety etam ādīnavaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3565: savilekhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3571: 'varṇaśabdaśloko niścaratīty evaṃ savilekho yāvad ayaśas vīty anena yathākramaṃ darśayati
T06asmahsbu:3572: śeṣais tribhiḥ padair yathākramaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavati |
T06asmahsbu:3573: tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity etad ādīnavaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3574: ete sarve doṣā maitryādiṣu susthitasya na bhavanti |
T06asmahsbu:3575: akliṣṭaḥ saṃsāraṃ satvārthaṃ no ca saṃtyajati || AMsa_17.27 ||
T06asmahsbu:3579: na tathaikaputrakeṣv api guṇavatsv api bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3582: ity ete ca bodhisatvamaitrādīnāṃ tīvratāṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3589: śatruvaśagā mārakṛtāntarāyāḥ kuśale 'prayuktāḥ duḥkhākrāntāḥ duḥkhābhūtā narakādiṣu |
T06asmahsbu:3602: ity ete daśavidhāḥ satvā bodhisatvakaruṇāyā ālambanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3604: heṭhāpahaṃ hy uttamabodhibījaṃ sukhāvahaṃ tāyapakam iṣṭahetuṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3605: svabhāvadaṃ dharmam upāśritasya bodhir na dūre jinātmajasya || AMsa_17.31
T06asmahsbu:3611: evaṃ pañcavidhāṃ karuṇām āśritya buddhatvam adūre veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3613: vijñāya saṃsāragataṃ samagraṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ caiva nirātmakaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:3614: nodvegam āyāti na cāpi doṣaiḥ prabādhyate kāruṇiko 'grabuddhiḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:3615: sarvaṃ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñāya bodhisatvo nodvegam āyāti kāruṇikatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:3617: evaṃ nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhito bhavati na saṃsāre yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3619: duḥkhātmakaṃ lokam avekṣamāṇo duḥkhāyate vetti ca tadyathāvat |
T06asmahsbu:3620: tasyābhyupāyaṃ parivarjane ca na khedam āyaty api vā kṛpāluḥ || AMsa_17.33
T06asmahsbu:3622: vetti ca tad yathāvad iti duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tasya ca duḥkhasya parivarjane 'bhyupāyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3624: etena jānann api saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tatparityāgopāyaṃ ca na khedam āpadyate bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāviśeṣād iti pradarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3626: kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt |
T06asmahsbu:3627: vipakṣahīnā ca viśuddhilābhāt caturvidheyaṃ karūṇātmakānāṃ || AMsa_17.34
T06asmahsbu:3633: na sā kṛpā yā na samā sadā vā nādhyāśayād vā pratipattito vā |
T06asmahsbu:3634: vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisatvo hy akṛpas tathā yaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:3635: tatra samā sukhitādiṣu yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā |
T06asmahsbu:3644: karuṇā tarur eṣa mahān mūlādiḥ puṣpapatraphalaḥ || AMsa_17.36 ||
T06asmahsbu:3652: mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet |
T06asmahsbu:3653: duḥkhākṣamaś ca dhīmān satvārthaṃ cintayen naiva || AMsa_17.37 ||
T06asmahsbu:3656: śubhajanmān anugacchan satvān paripācayen naiva || AMsa_17.38 ||
T06asmahsbu:3657: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pūrvottaraprasavasādharmyāt karuṇādīnāṃ mūlādibhāvaṃ sādhayati |
T06asmahsbu:3664: tasyāḥ seko maitrī tayā tadāpy āyanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3666: tataś ca karuṇodbhavaduḥkham utpadyate bodhisatvasya svārthaprayuktasya tatra saukhyotpādād vipulapuṣṭiḥ kṣāntipuṣṭir ity arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3673: ādhyātmikapratyayasiddhitaḥ svasaṃtānaparipākāt puṣpam iva janmābandhyaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3676: kaḥ kurvīta na karuṇāṃ satveṣu mahākṛpāguṇakareṣu |
T06asmahsbu:3677: duḥkhe 'pi saukhyam atulaṃ bhavati yad eṣāṃ kṛpājanitaṃ || AMsa_17.41 ||
T06asmahsbu:3681: aviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3682: kuta eva lokasaukhye svajīvite vā bhavet snehaḥ || AMsa_17.42 ||
T06asmahsbu:3683: sarvasya hi lokasya laukike saukhye svajīvite ca snehaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3684: tatrāpi ca niḥsnehānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sarvaduḥkhopaśame nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhitaṃ manaḥ
T06asmahsbu:3689: sneho na vidyate 'sau yo 'niravadyo na laukiko yaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3693: bodhisatvānāṃ tu karuṇāmayaḥ sneho niravadyaś ca laukikātikrāntaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3694: kathaṃ ca punar niravadya ity āha |
T06asmahsbu:3696: uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ katham iva na syāt sa niravadyaḥ || AMsa_17.44 ||
T06asmahsbu:3700: sneho na so 'sty arihatāṃ loke pratyekabodhibuddhānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3701: prāg eva tad anyeṣāṃ katham iva lokottaro na syāt || AMsa_17.45 ||
T06asmahsbu:3706: saṃtrāsayati tad ādau spṛṣṭaṃ tv abhinandayati gāḍhaṃ || AMsa_17.46 ||
T06asmahsbu:3708: satveṣu karuṇayā bodhisatvānāṃ yad duḥkham utpadyate tadādau saṃtrāsayati adhimukticaryābhūmau
T06asmahsbu:3710: spṛṣṭaṃ tu śuddhādhyāśayabhūmāv abhinandayaty evety arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3712: kim ataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyam abhibhavati sarva |
T06asmahsbu:3713: kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ || AMsa_17.47 ||
T06asmahsbu:3714: nāsty ata āścaryataraṃ yad duḥkham eva karuṇājanitaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ tathā sukhaṃ (Msa 128) bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:3716: yena sukhena vimuktā arhanto 'pi kṛtārthāḥ prāg evānye |
T06asmahsbu:3718: kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yad dānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3719: traidhātukam upabhogair na tatsukhaṃ tatkalāṃ spṛśati || AMsa_17.48 ||
T06asmahsbu:3720: yacca traidhātukaṃ sukham upabhogaiḥ kṛtaṃ na tatsukhaṃ tasya sukhasya kalāṃ spṛśatīty ayam uttarārdhasyārthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3723: duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3724: parahitahetor duḥkhaṃ kiṃ kārūṇikair na samupetam || AMsa_17.49 ||
T06asmahsbu:3728: karūṇā dānaṃ bhogāḥ sadā kṛpālor vivṛddhim upayānti |
T06asmahsbu:3729: snehānugrahajanitaṃ tac chaktikṛtaṃ sukhaṃ cāsmāt || AMsa_17.50 ||
T06asmahsbu:3734: tasmāc ca trayāt phalaṃ trividhaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:3739: vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi |
T06asmahsbu:3740: ākarṣāmi nayāmi ca karuṇāsannān pravadatīva || AMsa_17.51 ||
T06asmahsbu:3751: duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhāny anādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt |
T06asmahsbu:3752: sukhayaty ātmānam ataḥ kṛpālur ādhāya parasaukhyam || AMsa_17.52 ||
T06asmahsbu:3753: karuṇayā bodhisatvaḥ paraduḥkhair duḥkhitaḥ satveṣv anādhāya sukhaṃ kathaṃ sukhitaḥ (Msa 129) syāt |
T06asmahsbu:3754: tasmāt pareṣu sukham ādhāya bodhisatva ātmānam eva sukhayatīti veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3756: svaṃ dānaṃ kāruṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3757: bhogaiḥ sukhaya paraṃ vā māma py ayutasaukhyam || AMsa_17.53 ||
T06asmahsbu:3758: na hi kāruṇikasya vinā parasukhenāsti sukhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3759: tasyāyutasaukhyatvād bodhisatvas tena vinā no dānasya phalaṃ sukhaṃ necchati |
T06asmahsbu:3760: saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tan me satveṣu tat sukhasukhena |
T06asmahsbu:3761: phala teṣv eva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti || AMsa_17.54 ||
T06asmahsbu:3762: dānaṃ dadatā dānaṃ ca dānaphalaṃ ca tanmayā satveṣu dattaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3764: atas teṣv eva yāvat phalitavyaṃ tāvat phaleti loṭ |
T06asmahsbu:3767: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ || AMsa_17.55 ||
T06asmahsbu:3771: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me yad bhogās tathopatiṣṭhate |
T06asmahsbu:3772: yasmād ahaṃ dāne pāraṃparas tatprabandhakāmatvān na sukhe |
T06asmahsbu:3774: nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitā 'syeti || AMsa_17.56 ||
T06asmahsbu:3775: yo 'haṃ dānaphalaṃ sarvam eva karuṇayā nityaṃ parityajāmi nanv ata eva
T06asmahsbu:3776: veditavyaṃ nāsti me dānaphalenārthitvam iti bodhisatvo dānaṃ samanuśāsti |
T06asmahsbu:3777: dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cet tatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3779: kṣaṇam api dānena vinā dānābhirato bhavati naiva || AMsa_17.57 ||
T06asmahsbu:3781: akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmāt pratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3783: yas tvā karoti tasya tvaṃ phalasi |
T06asmahsbu:3786: pratikāranirvyapekṣaḥ paratra phalado 'sya kāmaṃ te || AMsa_17.58 ||
T06asmahsbu:3789: niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāv ahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:3796: nirmṛgyam ayācamāne 'py arthitvaṃ vighātaṃ vāvagamya svayam eva dānāt
T06asmahsbu:3800: sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3812: na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt |
T06asmahsbu:3814: tatra sukhatrayaṃ dānaprītiḥ parānugrahaprītiḥ bodhisaṃbhārasaṃbharaṇaprītiś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3826: eṣu pāramitāvipakṣadharmāvasthiteṣu yā karuṇā sā kṛpaṇādikaruṇā |
T06asmahsbu:3831: karuṇā bodhisatvānāṃ hetor mitrāt svabhāvataḥ || AMsa_17.63 ||
T06asmahsbu:3833: trividhāṃ vedanām ālambya tisṛbhir duḥkhatābhiḥ karuṇāyanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3834: aduḥkhāsukhā hi vedanā sukhaduḥkhayor anvayaḥ punas tadāvāhanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3835: uttarārdhena yathākramaṃ hetumitrasvabhāvaiḥ karuṇāyā hetvadhipatisamanantarapratyayān saṃdarśayati
T06asmahsbu:3838: pratipatter virāgāc ca nopalambhād viśuddhitaḥ || AMsa_17.64 ||
T06asmahsbu:3839: tatra samā trividhavedanāvastheṣu yat kiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā |
T06asmahsbu:3848: āśayato 'pi vibhutvād avikalpād aikyataś cāpi || AMsa_17.65 ||
T06asmahsbu:3853: etena yathoktānāṃ pūjāsevā'pramāṇānām anukramaṃ guṇaṃ ca samāsena saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3854: mahopadhibhir dhruvaṃ satkriyā cātyarthaṃ pūjanān mahadupadhidhruvasatkriyābhipūjī veditavyaḥ
T06asmahsbu:3863: lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena |
T06asmahsbu:3865: etena svabhāvasahāyālambhanakarmapadā caturvidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisatvalajjāyāḥ saṃdarśayati
T06asmahsbu:3871: tasyām eva lajjāpāramitāvipakṣavṛddhyā tatpratipakṣaparihāṇyā cātyarthaṃ lajjotpādanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3875: kleśānukuleṣu dharmeṣv indriyāguptadvāratvādiṣu ca prayogena lajjotpādanāt |
T06asmahsbu:3877: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tv adhikā || AMsa_18.3 ||
T06asmahsbu:3880: ataḥ paraṃ caturbhis tribhiś ca ślokair yathākramaṃ lajjāvipakṣe lajjāyāṃ ca doṣaguṇabhedaṃ darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3882: pratighopekṣāmānaḥ satvān upahanti śīlaṃ ca || AMsa_18.4 ||
T06asmahsbu:3884: ity atra ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābadhāyobhayavyābhādhāya cety saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3888: kaukṛtyāt savilekho bhavati sa saṃmānahānim āpnoti |
T06asmahsbu:3889: śrāddhāt mānuṣasaṃghāc chāstrā copekṣyate tasmāt || AMsa_18.5 ||
T06asmahsbu:3891: dṛṣṭe dharme ity etena dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3897: ity anena dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavatīty saṃdarśitam prāptakuśaladharmaparihānitaḥ
T06asmahsbu:3899: duḥkhaṃ viharati tasmān manaso 'py asvasthatām eti || AMsa_18.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:3900: ity etena lajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3901: ete sarve doṣā hrīmatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu |
T06asmahsbu:3903: yad ete ca doṣā na bhavanti |
T06asmahsbu:3904: deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ || AMsa_18.8 ||
T06asmahsbu:3906: saṃbhārāṃś ca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān |
T06asmahsbu:3908: satvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ || AMsa_18.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:3911: sa vipakṣapratipakṣai rahito 'rahitaś ca jāyate satataṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3914: ity etam ānuśaṃsaṃ hrīmān āpnoti jinaputraḥ || AMsa_18.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:3915: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3916: doṣamalino hi bālo hrīvirahāt suvasanaiḥ sugupto 'pi |
T06asmahsbu:3921: ākāśam iva na lipto hrīyuktaḥ jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3923: hrībhūṣitaś ca śobhati saṃparkagato jinasutānām || AMsa_18.12 ||
T06asmahsbu:3925: mātur iva vatsalatvaṃ hriyo vineyeṣu bodhisatvānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3927: ārakṣā cāpi hrīḥ saṃsaratāṃ sarvadoṣebhyaḥ || AMsa_18.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:3929: ebhir vastrādidṛṣṭāntair vihāre kleśapratipakṣatāṃ cāre lokadharmapratipakṣatāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3933: sarveṣu ca pravṛttir hrīvihitaṃ hrīmato liṅgam || AMsa_18.14 ||
T06asmahsbu:3935: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgam hrīmato darśayati |
T06asmahsbu:3936: yad uta sarvadoṣeṣv anadhivāsanā cāpravṛttiś ca |
T06asmahsbu:3939: āśayato 'pi vibhutvād akalpanād aikyataś cāpi || AMsa_18.15 ||
T06asmahsbu:3943: dṛḍhatvena ca sarvebhyas tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate || AMsa_18.16 ||
T06asmahsbu:3944: vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca satvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā |
T06asmahsbu:3945: nirbhīto bodhisatvo hi trayād yasmāt pravartate || AMsa_18.17 ||
T06asmahsbu:3950: katamasmāt trayān nirbhītaḥ pravartate ity āha |
T06asmahsbu:3951: līnatvāc ca calatvāc ca mohāc cotpadyate bhayaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:3952: kṛtyeṣu tasmād vijñeyā dhṛtisaṃjñā nije traye || AMsa_18.18 ||
T06asmahsbu:3953: sravakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayam utpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:3957: tasmān nijavīryāditraye dhṛtisaṃjñā veditavyā nija ity apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīye
T06asmahsbu:3958: prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:3961: duṣkareṣu vicitreṣu saṃsārātyāga eva ca || AMsa_18.20 ||
T06asmahsbu:3962: niḥsaṃkleśe ca tatraiva dhṛtir dhīrasya jāyate |
T06asmahsbu:3963: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ mataḥ || AMsa_18.21 ||
T06asmahsbu:3977: śalabhaiḥ pakṣavātaiś ca samudraiś ca sumeruvat || AMsa_18.22 ||
T06asmahsbu:3984: aniṣpannaś ca niṣpannaḥ suniṣpannaś ca bhūmiṣu || AMsa_18.24 ||
T06asmahsbu:3992: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati |
T06asmahsbu:4002: gṛhītā satvapākāya saddharmasya ca dhāraṇe || AMsa_18.26 ||
T06asmahsbu:4004: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca |
T06asmahsbu:4006: karma prathamavastuni svayaṃ pratipattiḥ parebhyaś ca tatsamākhyānaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4011: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etāny evas pañca vastuni śrutāni bhavanti |
T06asmahsbu:4023: sā punar eṣā śāstrajñatā bodhisatvānāṃ samādhimukhair dhāraṇīmukhaiś ca saṃgṛhītā |
T06asmahsbu:4029: lokajñatā hi dhīrāṇāṃ tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate || AMsa_18.27 ||
T06asmahsbu:4033: sā punaḥ kim artham ity āha |
T06asmahsbu:4039: dvayād astaṃgamas tasmāt tajjño lokajña ucyate || AMsa_18.29 ||
T06asmahsbu:4040: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasya udayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaś codayo yena ceti kṛtvā |
T06asmahsbu:4045: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4046: satyajñānād yato dhīmān lokajño hi nirucyate || AMsa_18.30 ||
T06asmahsbu:4052: prāmāṇikaś ca nītārtho nirjalpā prāptir asya ca || AMsa_18.31 ||
T06asmahsbu:4054: tatra prāmāṇika 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā |
T06asmahsbu:4059: sābhilāṣasya ca prāpteḥ pratiṣedho 'tra deśitaḥ || AMsa_18.32 ||
T06asmahsbu:4060: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudgalasya pratiṣedgo deśitaḥ
T06asmahsbu:4065: adhimukter vicārāc ca yathāvat parataḥ śravāt |
T06asmahsbu:4066: nirjalpād api ca jñānād apraṇāśo hi dhīmatāṃ || AMsa_18.33 ||
T06asmahsbu:4074: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānāc ca tā matāḥ || AMsa_18.34 ||
T06asmahsbu:4075: prathamā paryāye jñānam ekaikasyārthastha yāvanto nāma paryāyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4078: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4081: deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā |
T06asmahsbu:4082: dharmārthayor dvayor vācā jñānenaiva ca deśanā || AMsa_18.35 ||
T06asmahsbu:4086: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca |
T06asmahsbu:4087: tatra jñānena prayojanaṃ kasya punar deśanā || AMsa_18.35 ||
T06asmahsbu:4091: dharmasyoddeśanirdeśāt vākyena deśanā tayor eva dvayor sarvathā prāpaṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:4093: ato yac ca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4096: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karam ca darśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4097: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāṃ etya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃvid iti nirvacanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4102: yaś ca saṃbhāro yad arthaṃ ca saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:4107: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4108: trayaṃ cānyad dvayasyāpi pañcāpi jñānasaṃbhṛtiḥ || AMsa_18.39 ||
T06asmahsbu:4112: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanāt sarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4113: saṃtatyā bhāvanām etya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi |
T06asmahsbu:4114: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vīdhīre sarvārthasādhakaḥ || AMsa_18.40 ||
T06asmahsbu:4132: dhīmatām asamatvāt sā tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate || AMsa_18.42 ||
T06asmahsbu:4134: niśrayāt pratipakṣāc ca avatārāt tathaiva ca |
T06asmahsbu:4138: ity ebhiś caturdaśabhir ākārair bodhisatvānāṃ smṛtyupastānabhāvanā viśiṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:4139: katham āśrayato mahāyāne śrutacintābhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām āśritya |
T06asmahsbu:4140: kathaṃ pratipakṣataḥ caturviparyāsapratipakṣāṇām apy aśuciduḥkhānityānātmasaṃjñānaṃ pratipakṣatvāt kāyādidharmanairātmyapraveśataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4142: caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair yathākramaṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyāvatārāt svayaṃ pareṣāṃ cāvatāraṇāt |
T06asmahsbu:4146: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃ yogāya nāvasaṃyogāya |
T06asmahsbu:4148: katham anuvṛttitaḥ laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ cānuvṛttyā tadupasaṃhitasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāt tebhyas tadupadeśārthaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4154: | katham utpattitaḥ saṃcintyabhavopapattau cakravartyādibhūtasya viśiṣṭakāyavedanādisaṃpattau tadasaṃkleśataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4155: kathaṃ mātrataḥ mṛdvā api smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyās tad anyebhyo adhimātratvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4159: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt |
T06asmahsbu:4165: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4168: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu || AMsa_18.46 ||
T06asmahsbu:4170: satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ || AMsa_18.47 ||
T06asmahsbu:4171: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:4193: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate |
T06asmahsbu:4194: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyatge |
T06asmahsbu:4197: yac chamathapragrahopakleśayor layāuddhatyayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa vīryam ārabhate |
T06asmahsbu:4200: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:4203: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaś ca parasya ca || AMsa_18.50 ||
T06asmahsbu:4204: sarvārthasiddhir laukikī lokottarā ca veditavyā ca |
T06asmahsbu:4206: niśrayāc ca prabhedāc ca upāyād abhinirhṛteḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4210: upāyaś cābhinirhāraḥ ṣaḍvidhaś ca vidhīyate || AMsa_18.52 ||
T06asmahsbu:4216: naibandhikas tṛtīyaś ca caturthaḥ prātipakṣikaḥ || AMsa_18.53 ||
T06asmahsbu:4218: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śaddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ upāyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4220: praśrabdhir anugrahātmakaḥ smṛtiḥ saṃ prajanyaṃ copanibandhakaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4228: praṇidher vaśitāyaś ca dharmaprāpteś ca nirhṛtiḥ || AMsa_18.54 ||
T06asmahsbu:4229: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuś ca |
T06asmahsbu:4231: tābhir upasaṃkramya bhāṣā cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt |
T06asmahsbu:4232: sthitivikrīḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisatvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4233: praṇidhir yena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisatvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti
T06asmahsbu:4234: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre |
T06asmahsbu:4235: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4239: bodhiś caryā śruta cātra śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā |
T06asmahsbu:4241: śraddhendriyasya bodhiḥ padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4255: etena yasyām avasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4256: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhād yathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatā ca |
T06asmahsbu:4266: dharmālokavivṛddhyā ca prītyā āpūryate dhruvam || AMsa_18.59 ||
T06asmahsbu:4268: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prīṇayati |
T06asmahsbu:4278: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisatvaḥ yathākāmaṃ sarvatra viharati tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena ca vihāreṇānyasyopagamāt |
T06asmahsbu:4280: yathā cakravartinaḥ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam upanetavyaṃ copapraṇayati |
T06asmahsbu:4282: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ paraiti |
T06asmahsbu:4288: etena yad bodhyaṅgaṃ yathāṅgaṃ tad abhidyatitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4300: jñeyāvṛtteś ca mārgasya vaiśeṣikaguṇasya ca || AMsa_18.65 ||
T06asmahsbu:4303: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśas tena tadrthāvabodhāt |
T06asmahsbu:4306: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ (Msa
T06asmahsbu:4307: 146) hi kālaṃ akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati |
T06asmahsbu:4308: samyaksmṛtyā śamathapragrahopekṣānimitteṣu layāuddhatyābhāvān mārgasaṃmukhībhāvāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati |
T06asmahsbu:4309: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayaty evam aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante |
T06asmahsbu:4311: cittasya citte sthānāc ca dharmapravicayād api |
T06asmahsbu:4312: samyak sthitim upāśritya śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā || AMsa_18.66 ||
T06asmahsbu:4314: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayād yathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:4315: na tu vinā samyaksamādhinety etac chamathavipaśyanālakṣaṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4317: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇam ākaṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt |
T06asmahsbu:4319: ākaṅkṣed bhikṣur aho vatāhaṃ kāmair iti vistreṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāv eva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau |
T06asmahsbu:4320: yad uta śamathaś vipaśyanā cety evam ādi |
T06asmahsbu:4325: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hy asaṃskṛte || AMsa_18.67 ||
T06asmahsbu:4327: sarvabhūmigatā dhīre sa yogaḥ sarvasādhakaḥ || AMsa_18.68 ||
T06asmahsbu:4328: ity upaniṣan matety evamādinā śamathavipaśyanāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4335: saṃskāro hi saṃsṛtaṃ tad atra nāstīty asaṃskṛtaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4336: tad eva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ c pariśodhayitavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4338: tad etad yathākramaṃ pariśuddhir viśuddhiś ca |
T06asmahsbu:4341: kṣipraprāptau kriyāśuddhau vartmācchede ca kauśalaṃ || AMsa_18.69 ||
T06asmahsbu:4344: yatkauśalyaṃ samāśritya sarvārthān sādhayanti te || AMsa_18.70 ||
T06asmahsbu:4348: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā |
T06asmahsbu:4352: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisatvānām asamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalyam ity ayaṃ prabhedaḥ
T06asmahsbu:4356: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ || AMsa_18.71 ||
T06asmahsbu:4360: prakāśayanti saddharmaṃ nityaṃ saṃdhārayanti ca || AMsa_18.73 ||
T06asmahsbu:4361: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ darśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4368: samādhinā mahatī sāpi mahatī punas trividhā |
T06asmahsbu:4369: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ akuśalabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu |
T06asmahsbu:4370: pariśuddhabhūmikā tv adhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ity ayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4373: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat |
T06asmahsbu:4374: praṇidhānaṃ hi dhīrāṇām asamaṃ sarvabhūmiṣu || AMsa_18.74 ||
T06asmahsbu:4375: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittāt sadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat |
T06asmahsbu:4380: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4386: āyatyāṃ vābhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittāt punaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathārthasamṛddhitā vedutavyā |
T06asmahsbu:4388: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4389: citram adhimukticaryābhūmāv evaṃ ca syām iti |
T06asmahsbu:4391: viśuddhaṃ uttarottarāsu bhūmiṣu viśuddhiviśeṣād ā bodher ity eṣa prabhedataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4394: nairātmyaṃ dvividhaṃ jñeyo hy ātmagrāhasya cāśrayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4400: sa eva samādhis trividho jñeyo grāhyagrāhakabhāvataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4401: trividhasya grāhasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4402: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4404: nirvikalpo 'pi vimukho ratiyuktaś ca sarvadā || AMsa_18.78 ||
T06asmahsbu:4418: tatra saṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ity apraṇihitasya samādhyupaniṣatbhāvena deśitaṃ
T06asmahsbu:4421: kaḥ punar anityārtho yāvac chāntārthaḥ ity āha |
T06asmahsbu:4423: vikalpopaśamārthaś ca dhīmatāṃ tac catuṣṭayam || AMsa_18.81 ||
T06asmahsbu:4425: yan nityaṃ nāsti tad anityaṃ teṣāṃ yat parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4428: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpata ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tv astīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4437: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskāram iti paścād vacanād iyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā
T06asmahsbu:4441: sā cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇam utpādanirodhau na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4442: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4443: tadanantaraṃ pravṛttir na syāt prabandhābhāvāt naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4445: hetuto hi sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam utpadyate bhavatīty arthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4446: tad yadi bhūtvā punar uttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4448: na ca tat tenaiva hetunā bhavitum arhati tasyopayuktahetukatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4450: tasmāt pratikṣaṇam avaśyaṃ pūrvahetukam anyad bhavatīti veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4451: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo no yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4452: atha apy evam iṣyata notpannaṃ punar utpadyate yad arthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syād utapannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścān nirudhyate notpannamātram eveti |
T06asmahsbu:4457: na hi virodhayos tulyo hetur upalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:4463: māyopamās te bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikās tāvat kālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti |
T06asmahsbu:4465: te hi saṃskārāṇām udayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti |
T06asmahsbu:4466: anyathā hi teṣām api nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syur yathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyantāṃ
T06asmahsbu:4467: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayam eva vā tiṣṭhet svayam eva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ
T06asmahsbu:4472: kkena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4475: athāpi syād vināpi sthitikāraṇena vināśakāraṇābhāvāt avatiṣṭhate |
T06asmahsbu:4476: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścād vināśayati agnineva śyāmateti |
T06asmahsbu:4478: na hi vināśakāraṇaṃ paścād api kiṃcid asti |
T06asmahsbu:4481: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatir visadṛśī gṛhyate ma tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4482: apām api kvathyamānānām agnisaṃbandhād alpataratamotpattito 'timandyād ante punar anutpattir gṛhyate |
T06asmahsbu:4484: ekāntikaṃ hy saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā yad uta saṃskṛtasyānityatā |
T06asmahsbu:4486: kaṃcit kālam asyānityatā na syād iti anaikāntikam anityatālakṣaṇaṃ prasahyate |
T06asmahsbu:4487: athāpi syāt pratikṣaṇam apūrvotpattau tad evedam iti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syād iti |
T06asmahsbu:4488: tad bhavaty eva sādṛśasya anuvṛtter māyākārapalakavat |
T06asmahsbu:4492: na hi tathaivāvasthitasyānte nirodhaḥ syād ādilakṣaṇanirviśiṣṭatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4493: tasmān na tat tad evety avadhāryate ante pariṇāmopalabdheś ca |
T06asmahsbu:4495: tad yadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhaved ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām ante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta |
T06asmahsbu:4496: tasmād ādita evānyathātvam ārabdhaṃ yat krameṇābhivardhamānam ante vyaktim āpadyante kṣīrasyeva dadhyavasthāyāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4497: yāvat tu tad anyathātvaṃ sūkṣmatvān na paricchidyate |
T06asmahsbu:4498: tāvat sādṛśyānuvṛttes tad evedam imi jñāyata iti siddhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4505: (Msa 151) kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāś cakṣūrūpādayo hetutaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4507: na tv akṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitum arhati yathā nityād anytyatam iti |
T06asmahsbu:4508: cittsya khalv api sarve saṃskārāḥ phalaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4511: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāś cakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmūrchnāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ
T06asmahsbu:4512: tasmāt te cittasya phalaṃ cittasya cādhipatyaṃ saṃskāreṣu |
T06asmahsbu:4514: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti |
T06asmahsbu:4515: tathā viñānapratyayaṃ nāma rūpam ity uktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4518: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante |
T06asmahsbu:4520: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃś cittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇam adhimucyate tad apy asya tahaiva syād iti |
T06asmahsbu:4523: tathā hi pāpakāreṣu satveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti |
T06asmahsbu:4527: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4528: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4529: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4535: cayāyāpārthād ayogāc ca āśrayatva asaṃbhavāt || AMsa_18.86 ||
T06asmahsbu:4539: anuvṛtteś ca cittasya kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam || AMsa_18.88 ||
T06asmahsbu:4540: ādyas taratamenāpi yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam iti |
T06asmahsbu:4550: viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4551: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu parinirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4556: abījatvena yas teṣām evārhataś caram eṣāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4558: yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ utpādaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4559: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyām utpattāv ādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumān aviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4561: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt tad uttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtter uttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt |
T06asmahsbu:4566: | na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet |
T06asmahsbu:4571: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4573: na hi tiṣṭhaty āśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4574: yena tiṣṭhati ta ārūḍhānavasthānavad anyathā hy āśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet |
T06asmahsbu:4577: ma hi tathāsthitasyaiva rāgādibhir vikāraḥ saṃbhavati
T06asmahsbu:4578: | na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāv avināśe saty ante vikārābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4579: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau |
T06asmahsbu:4580: na hi tahtāsthiteṣv eva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syād utpattiḥ sugatau vā |
T06asmahsbu:4587: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatir nāma kācit kriyā yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4588: sa hy utpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayed anutpannā vā
T06asmahsbu:4589: | yad utpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcid gata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate |
T06asmahsbu:4590: athānutpannā tena asatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4591: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4595: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārād anyopalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:4596: tasmān nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃtatyutpādād anyā gatiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4604: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyos tiryaggamanam agner ūrdhvaṃ jvalanam apāṃ nimne syandanaṃ
T06asmahsbu:4610: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvam antareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasmin kāle punar bījabhāvo yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4612: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvam abhyupagantuṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4614: tathā hi caramatvam eva na saṃbhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4617: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti |
T06asmahsbu:4620: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ || AMsa_18.89 ||
T06asmahsbu:4624: cittānuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyam apy ataḥ || AMsa_18.91 ||
T06asmahsbu:4629: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍvidhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate |
T06asmahsbu:4634: tac cobhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na syāt paścād viśeṣakāraṇābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4635: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:4636: na hy avasthitasya calatvaṃ syāt tatsvabhāvād iti prasādhitam etat |
T06asmahsbu:4639: tac chabenāpaś ca gṛhyante vāyuś ca |
T06asmahsbu:4640: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle |
T06asmahsbu:4648: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ anyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4649: varṇagandharasasparśānāṃ pṛthivyādibhis tulyakāraṇatvāt tathaiva kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4651: (Msa 154) na hi tejasy utpanne tejaḥsahotpannam indhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate |
T06asmahsbu:4652: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4654: ślokabadhānurodhād varṇādīnāṃ pūrvam abhidhānaṃ paścāt tejasaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4655: śabdaḥ punar yo 'pi kālāntaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭhādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ na hy asati kṣaṇikatve
T06asmahsbu:4657: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham eva cittānuvṛtter yathā pūrvam uktaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4659: pṛcchrayate khalv api sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā |
T06asmahsbu:4661: kasmād bhavān anityatvam icchati na saṃskārārāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ necchatīti |
T06asmahsbu:4662: yady evaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇam anyatvasyāgrahaṇād iti sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4663: prasiddhakṣaṇikabhāveṣv api pradīpādiṣu niścalāvasthāyāṃ tadagrahaṇād akṣaṇikatvaṃ kasmān neṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:4664: yady evaṃ vadet pūrvavat paścād agrahaṇād iti |
T06asmahsbu:4667: yady evaṃ vadet vilakṣaṇatvāt pradīpāditadanyasaṃskārāṇām iti |
T06asmahsbu:4669: dvidhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca |
T06asmahsbu:4670: tad yadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyam abhipretam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4671: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaur vā gor iti |
T06asmahsbu:4672: atha vṛttavailakṣaṇyam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpapradīpānāṃ prasiddhatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:4674: kaccid icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yānāruḍho gacched iti |
T06asmahsbu:4677: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tad āśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4678: yady evaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avathānam iti |
T06asmahsbu:4680: | na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatter iti |
T06asmahsbu:4681: yady evaṃ vadet sati kaṇikatve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmāt pradīpād iva kṣaṇikatvaṃ na siddham iti
T06asmahsbu:4683: sadṛśasaṃtatiprabandhavṛttyā hi kṣaṇikatvam eṣāṃ na prajñāyate |
T06asmahsbu:4684: yataḥ saty apy aparāparatve tad evedam iti viparyāso jāyate |
T06asmahsbu:4685: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāt tadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punar vyavadānam ity evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4687: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu |
T06asmahsbu:4691: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4694: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4695: indhanāgnyor avācyatvam upalabdher dvayena hi || AMsa_18.95 ||
T06asmahsbu:4696: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4697: nairarthakyād ato draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate || AMsa_18.96 ||
T06asmahsbu:4698: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet |
T06asmahsbu:4699: tatkarmalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃbodho bādhyate tridhā || AMsa_18.97 ||
T06asmahsbu:4700: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api |
T06asmahsbu:4703: darśanādiṣu yatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ na yujyate || AMsa_18.99 ||
T06asmahsbu:4704: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4705: tṛtīyapakṣābhāvāc ca pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate || AMsa_18.100 ||
T06asmahsbu:4707: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca || AMsa_18.101 ||
T06asmahsbu:4711: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā || AMsa_18.103 ||
T06asmahsbu:4712: pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4714: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu |
T06asmahsbu:4715: yataś ca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4716: evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve doṣāvakāśo na nāstitve |
T06asmahsbu:4717: sa punar dravyato nāstīti kathaṃ veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4719: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat upalabdhir hi nāma buddhyā pratipattiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4720: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4722: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānam nupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdhā bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4723: na sa evam upalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4725: viparyāsāt tathā hy anātmany ātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā |
T06asmahsbu:4726: tasmād ya evaṃ pudgalagrāho viparyāsaḥ saḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4729: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hy eṣa saṃkleśo yad uta ahaṃ mameti |
T06asmahsbu:4730: na ca viparyāsaḥ saṃkleśo bhavitum arahati |
T06asmahsbu:4731: na caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4733: tathā hi tadhetukāḥ kliṣṭā (Msa 156) rāgādaya utpadyante |
T06asmahsbu:4734: yatra punar vastuni rūpādisaṃjñake prajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmāt kim ekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvid anyatvena |
T06asmahsbu:4741: ekatve hi skandhānām ātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasatvaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4746: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanam atikramya pudgalsya dravyato 'stitvam icchanti ta idaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ
T06asmahsbu:4747: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4751: yathāgnir andhanān nānyo nānyo vaktavya iti |
T06asmahsbu:4753: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4755: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnir hi nāma tejodhātur indhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni |
T06asmahsbu:4756: teṣāṃ ca bhinnaṃ lakṣaṇam ity anya evāgnir indhanāt |
T06asmahsbu:4757: loke ca vināpy agninā dṛṣṭam indhanaṃ kāṣṭād vināpi cendhanenāgnir iti siddham anyatvaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4758: śāstre ca bhagavatā na kvacid agnīndhanayor avācyatvam uktam ity ayuktam etat |
T06asmahsbu:4759: vinā punar indhanenāgnir astīti katham idaṃ vijñāyate |
T06asmahsbu:4760: upalabdhes tathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūram api jvalat paraiti |
T06asmahsbu:4761: athāpi syād vāyus tatrendhanam iti ata evāgnīndhanayor anyatvam it siddhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4764: dvayaṃ hi tatropalabhyate arcir vāyuś cendhanatvena |
T06asmahsbu:4765: asty eva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvad vijñāntā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā (Msa 157) ca |
T06asmahsbu:4768: sa hi darśanādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā |
T06asmahsbu:4770: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4773: na hi tatra kiṃcit sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4774: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet |
T06asmahsbu:4775: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavann aniṣṭaṃ vijñānam anityaṃ na pravartayet |
T06asmahsbu:4778: asau draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4780: tatkarmalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ yadi dravyato 'sti tasya karmāpy upalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:4785: tasmiṃś ca dravyata iṣyamāṇe buddhasya bhagavataḥ saṃbodho bādhyate tridhā |
T06asmahsbu:4789: ni hi pudgalābhisaṃbodhe kiṃcid gambhīram abhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4795: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvad vijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhaven niṣpratyatno vā |
T06asmahsbu:4796: saprayatnasya vā punar asau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr vā bhaved ākasmikaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4797: tatpratyayo darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api |
T06asmahsbu:4798: tasmād eva ca doṣatrayād vakṣyamānāt tadyatnapratyayatvaṃ ca
T06asmahsbu:4800: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4803: ity asati vyāpare pudgalasya darśanādau katham asau draṣṭā bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:4804: yāvad vijñātā doṣatrayād ity uktaṃ katamasmād doṣatrayāt |
T06asmahsbu:4807: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni |
T06asmahsbu:4808: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudglaḥ karteti katham asau draṣṭā bhavati yāvad vijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācit prayatno na syād anityo na syāt |
T06asmahsbu:4809: nitye ca prayatne darśnādīnāṃyugapac ca nityaṃ ca pravṛrtiḥ syād iti doṣaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4810: tasmān na yujyate darśnādiṣu prayatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4811: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4814: tasya tathā sthitasya prayatnatvaṃ na yujyate |
T06asmahsbu:4816: sati hi tatprayatnatve na kadācit pudgalo nāstīti |
T06asmahsbu:4817: kim arthaṃ prāk prayatno na syād yadā notpannaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4819: tṛtīyaś ca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yan na sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syād iti |
T06asmahsbu:4822: evaṃ tāvad yuktima āśritya dravyataḥ pudgalo nopalabhyate |
T06asmahsbu:4824: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca ||
T06asmahsbu:4825: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyām asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakas tu nopalabhyate ya imaṃś ca skhandān nikṣipati anyāṃś ca skhandān pratisaṃdadhāti anyatra dharmasaṃketād iti deśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4827: ātmadṛṣṭir bhavati jīvadṛṣṭiḥ nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4829: śūnyatāyām asya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate |
T06asmahsbu:4832: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4838: pudgalaprajñaptim antareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś ca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4839: parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4843: tayor vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa parijñātāvībhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ |
T06asmahsbu:4845: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ
T06asmahsbu:4846: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ity ayam atra nayo veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4848: na hi tāvad asāv ātmadṛṣṭyutpādanārthaṃ yujyate yasmāt ātmadṛṣṭir anutpādyā pūrvam evotpannatvāt
T06asmahsbu:4850: yadi cātmadarśanena mokṣa ity asau deśyeta |
T06asmahsbu:4851: evaṃ sati syāt ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānām ātmadarśanaṃ vidyate
T06asmahsbu:4853: na hi pūrvam ātmānam anātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścid ātmato gṛhṇāti |
T06asmahsbu:4854: yathā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ pūrvam agṛhītvā paścād gṛhṇātīti yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścād api mokṣo na syāt |
T06asmahsbu:4855: sati cātmany avaśyam ahaṃkāramamakārābhyām ātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiś ca tannidānaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4856: kleśair bhavitavyam iti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt |
T06asmahsbu:4859: tasmin hi sati niyatam ete doṣāḥ prasajyante |
T06asmahsbu:4860: evam ebhir guṇair nityaṃ bodhisatvāḥ samanvitāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4861: ātmārthaṃ ca na riñcanti parārthaṃ sādhayanti ca || AMsa_18.104 ||
T06asmahsbu:4863: mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre bodhipakṣādhikāraḥ aṣṭādaśaḥ samāptaḥ CHAPITRE XIX ekonaviṃśatyadhikāraḥ āścarya vibhāge trayaḥ ślokāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:4865: durbaleṣu kṣamā kāye jīvite nirapekṣiṇaḥ || AMsa_19.1 ||
T06asmahsbu:4866: vīryārambho hy anāsvādo dhyāneṣu sukha eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:4867: niṣkalpanā ca prajñāyām āścaryaṃ dhīmatāṃ gataṃ || AMsa_19.2 ||
