T06asmahsbu:5394: nirvāṇecchā ca dhīrāṇāṃ satveṣv āśaya iṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:5395: aśuddhaś ca viśuddhaś ca suviśuddhaḥ sarvabhūmiṣu || AMsa_20-21.6 ||
T06asmahsbu:5398: paratreṣṭaphalecchā hitādhyāśayaḥ ihaiva kuśalapravṛttīcchā nirvāṇecchā tadubhayāhyāśaya eveti nānyo veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5405: gaṇasya karṣaṇatvāc ca dhīmatāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu || AMsa_20-21.7 ||
T06asmahsbu:5406: caturvidhaḥ satvaparigraho bodhisatvānāṃ praṇidhānaparigraho veditavyo bodhicittena sarvasatvaparigrahaṇāt
T06asmahsbu:5412: samādheś ca vibhutvasya cotpattir dhīmatāṃ matā || AMsa_20-21.8 ||
T06asmahsbu:5413: caturvidhā bodhisatvānām upapattiḥ karmādhipatyena yādhimukticaryābhūmisthitānāṃ karmavaśenābhipretasthānopapattiḥ praṇidhānavaśena yā bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ sarvastavaparipācanārthaṃ tiryagādihīnasthānopapattiḥ samādhyādhipatyena yā dhyānāni vyāvartya kāmadhātāv upapattiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5417: nirukteḥ prāptitaś caiva vihāro bhūmir eva ca || AMsa_20-21.9 ||
T06asmahsbu:5420: vihṛtya sasukhair dhyānair janma kāme tataḥ param || AMsa_20-21.10 ||
T06asmahsbu:5422: vinā ca cittasaṃkleśaṃ satvānāṃ paripācanā || AMsa_20-21.11 ||
T06asmahsbu:5426: satvapākasya niṣpattir jāyate ca tataḥ param || AMsa_20-21.13 ||
T06asmahsbu:5428: etasmāc ca vyavasthānād vijñeyaṃ bhūmilakṣaṇam || AMsa_20-21.14 ||
T06asmahsbu:5433: tṛtīyāyāṃ sātiśayasukhair bodhisatvadhyānair vihṛtyāparihīnasyaiva tebhyaḥ kāmadhātāv upapattiḥ
T06asmahsbu:5435: pañcamyāṃ caturāryasatyabahulavihāritayā vinātamanaś cittasaṃkleśena satvānāṃ paripācanāyāṃ nānāśāstraśilpapraṇayanāt |
T06asmahsbu:5443: bhūmiṣṭhe ca pudgalavibhāgam ārabhya dvau ślokau |
T06asmahsbu:5446: upekṣakaḥ kṣetraviśodhakaś ca syāt satvapāke kuśalo maharddhiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5447: saṃpūrṇakāyaś ca nidarśane ca śakto 'bhiṣiktaḥ khalu bodhisatvaḥ ||
T06asmahsbu:5453: pañcamyāṃ saṃtānabhede nirmāṇo daśabhiś cittāśayaviśuddhisamatābhiḥ sarvasaṃtānasamatāpraveśāt
T06asmahsbu:5454: ṣaṣṭyāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānabhede nirmāṇaḥ pratītyasamutpādatathatābahulavihāritayā kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣābhyāṃ tathatāyāḥ saṃkleśvyavadānādarśanāt |
T06asmahsbu:5456: saptamyām ekakṣaṇalabdhabuddhir nirnimittavihārasāmarthyāt pratipakṣaṇaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhpakṣabhāvanātaḥ
T06asmahsbu:5460: daśamyāṃ bodhisatvabhūmau bodhisatvo maharddhikaś ca vyavasthāpyate mahābhijñālābhāt |
T06asmahsbu:5461: saṃpūrṇakāyaś cāpramāṇasamādhidhāraṇīmukhasphuraṇād āśrayasya nidarśane ca śakto vyavasthāpyate tuṣitabhavanavāsādinirmāṇanidarśanāt |
T06asmahsbu:5465: adhicitte 'py adhiprajñe prajñā tu dvayagocarā || AMsa_20-21.17 ||
T06asmahsbu:5466: dharmatatvaṃ tadajñānajñānād yā vṛttir eva ca |
T06asmahsbu:5467: prajñāyā gocaras tasmād dvibhūmau tadvyavasthitiḥ || AMsa_20-21.18 ||
T06asmahsbu:5469: śikṣāṇāṃ bhāvanāyāś ca phalam anyac caturvidham |
T06asmahsbu:5472: kṣetraśuddhiś ca satvānāṃ pākaniṣpattir eva ca || AMsa_20-21.20 ||
T06asmahsbu:5474: caturvidhaṃ phalaṃ hy etat caturbhūmisamāśritam || AMsa_20-21.21 ||
T06asmahsbu:5475: prathamāyāṃ bhūmau dharmatāṃ pratividhya dvitīyāyām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣate
T06asmahsbu:5485: ataḥ paraṃ caturvidhaṃ śikṣāphalaṃ caturbhūmisamāśritaṃ veditavyaṃ yathākramaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5486: tatra dvitīyaṃ phalaṃ sa evānimitto vihāro 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ kṣetraśuddhiś ca veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5493: tad anyāsv iti saptamyāṃ yāvad buddhabūmāv abhayor vimuktivimuktijñānayor viśodhanā |
T06asmahsbu:5494: sā punar vimuktiś caturvidhaphalāvaraṇāc ca veditavyā pratighātāvaraṇāc ca buddhabhūmau |
T06asmahsbu:5500: niṣpannā apy aniṣpannā niṣpannāś ca punar matāḥ || AMsa_20-21.24 ||
T06asmahsbu:5506: tatrādhimukticaryābhūmir aniṣpannā śeṣā niṣpannā ity etāḥ sarvabhūmayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5507: niṣpannā api punaḥ saptamāniṣpannāḥ śeṣā niṣpannā nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt
T06asmahsbu:5508: | yat punaḥ pramuditādibhūmir niṣpannā pūrvamuktā tatra niṣpattir yathāvyavasthāpitabhūmimanasikāreṇa |tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanāmātrajñānāt tad avikalpanā ca ca veditavyā |
T06asmahsbu:5510: tad pai ca kalpanāmātraṃ na vikalpayaty evaṃ grāhyagrāhakāvikalpajñānalābhād bhūmipariniṣpattir uktā bhavati |
T06asmahsbu:5511: api ca khalu bhūmīnāṃ bhāvanā ca niṣpattiś cobhayam acintyaṃ sarvabhūmiṣu |
T06asmahsbu:5512: tathā hi tad bodhisatvānāṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ buddhānāṃ ca viṣayo nānyeṣāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5514: adhimuktir hi sarvatra sālokā liṅgam iṣyate |
T06asmahsbu:5518: etadbhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisatvasya daśavidhaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5519: yāṃ bhūmiṃ praviṣṭas tatra sāloko yāṃ na praviṣṭas tatrādhimuktir ity etad ekaṃ liṅgaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5523: sarvabhūmiprativedhaś ca tad abhinirhārakauśalyataḥ sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittatā |
T06asmahsbu:5527: buddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu copapattiḥ sarvakālam ity etāni aparāṇi liṅgāni bodhisatvasya |
T06asmahsbu:5529: nācchando na ca lubdhahrasvahṛdayo na krodhano nālaso nāmaitrīkarūṇāśayo na kumatiḥ kalpair vikalpair hataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5530: no vikṣiptamatiḥ sukhair na ca hato duḥkhair na vā vyāvartate satyaṃ mitram upāśritaḥ śrutaparaḥ pūjāparaḥ śāstari || AMsa_20-21.29 ||
T06asmahsbu:5531: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty aharaharyo hy uttamopāyavit
T06asmahsbu:5533: jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍaty abhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣām uparisthito guṇanidhir jñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ || AMsa_20-21.30 ||
T06asmahsbu:5553: dhīmatām anuśaṃso hi sarvathā sarvabhūmiṣu || AMsa_20-21.31 ||
T06asmahsbu:5560: dharmakāyaparipūripariniṣpattaye ca uttarād uttarataraṃ hetusaṃparigrahaṃ karoti |
T06asmahsbu:5565: paśyatāṃ bodhim āsannāṃ satvārthasya ca sādhanaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5566: tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate || AMsa_20-21.32 ||
T06asmahsbu:5570: dauḥśīlyam alasyānyayānamanasikāram alasya cātikramād vimalety ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:5571: tasmāt tarhy asmābhis tulyābhinirhāre sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīya iti vacanāt |
T06asmahsbu:5573: tathā hi tasyāṃ samādhibalenāpramāṇadharmaparyeṣaṇadhāraṇāt mahāntaṃ dharmāvabhāsaṃ pareṣāṃ karoti |
T06asmahsbu:5575: arciṣmatīti tadyogāt sā bhūmir dvayadāhataḥ || AMsa_20-21.34 ||
T06asmahsbu:5576: sā bodhipakṣātmikā prjñā dvayadahanapratyupasthānā tasyāṃ bāhulyena |
T06asmahsbu:5577: dvayaṃ punaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ cātra veditavyaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5578: satvānāṃ paripākaś ca svacittasya ca rakṣaṇā |
T06asmahsbu:5579: dhīmadbhir jīyate duḥkhaṃ durjayā tena kathyate || AMsa_20-21.35 ||
T06asmahsbu:5583: uktā hy abhimukhī bhūmiḥ prajñāpāramitāśrayāt || AMsa_20-21.36 ||
T06asmahsbu:5584: sā hi prajñāpāramitāśrayeṇa nirvāṇasaṃsārayor apratiṣṭhānāt saṃsāranirvāṇayor abhimukhī
T06asmahsbu:5586: ekāyanapathaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭas tadupaśleṣatvāt dūraṃ gatā bhavati prayogapayantagamanāt |
T06asmahsbu:5588: dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyāṃ avicalanāt nimittasaṃjñayā animittābhogasaṃjñayā ca |
T06asmahsbu:5593: dvayavyāpter ity samādhimukhadhāraṇīmukhavyāpanān meghenevākāśasthālīyasyāśrayasaṃniviṣṭasya śrutadharmasya dharmameghety ucyate |
T06asmahsbu:5596: vividhakuśalābhinirhāranimittaṃ sadā sarvatra ratyā viharaṇād bodhisatvānāṃ bhūmayo vihārā ity ucyante |
T06asmahsbu:5598: bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eveṣṭā hi bhūmayaḥ || AMsa_20-21.40 ||
T06asmahsbu:5599: bhūyo bhūyo 'mitāsv āsu ūrdhvaṃgamanayogād bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eva vihārāḥ punar bhūmaya ucyante |
T06asmahsbu:5605: prativedhāc ca bhūmīnāṃ niṣpatteś ca caturvidhaḥ || AMsa_20-21.41 ||
T06asmahsbu:5608: caritalābho daśasu dharmacariteṣu ca vartanāt tasyām eva |
T06asmahsbu:5619: (Msa 184) paripācanaṃ hy atra vinayanaṃ ca deśitāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5632: jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.44 ||
T06asmahsbu:5640: atrāvaraṇāśeṣaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvasatvakleśavinayanād utpāditakleśeṣv api ca tatkleśapratipakṣavighānāt kliṣṭajanānukampayā saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:5641: anye hy araṇāvihāriṇaḥ satvānāṃ kasyacid eva tadālambanasya kleśasyotpattipratyayamātraṃ pratiharanti |
T06asmahsbu:5645: sadaiva sarvapraśnānāṃ visarjaka namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.46 ||
T06asmahsbu:5646: atra pañcabhir ākārair praṇidhijñānaviśeṣaṃ bhagavataḥ saṃdarśayati |
T06asmahsbu:5659: āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike |
T06asmahsbu:5660: avyāhatamate nityaṃ sudeśika namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.47 ||
T06asmahsbu:5661: atra samāsato yac ca deśyate yena deśyate tatra nityam avyāhatamatitvenabhagavataś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido deśitāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5662: tatra dvayaṃ deśyate āśrayaś ca dharmaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5667: upetya vacanais teṣāṃ carijña āgatau gatau |
T06asmahsbu:5668: niḥsāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.48 ||
T06asmahsbu:5669: atra ṣaḍbhir abhijñābhiḥ samyagavavādatvaṃ bhagavato darśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5671: teṣāṃ bhāṣayā divyaśrotrābhijñayā cittacaritraṃ jñātvā cetaḥparyāyābhijñayā yathā pūrvāntād ihāgatir yathā ca saṃsārān niḥsāraṇaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5675: dṛṣṭamātrāt prasādasya vidhāyaka namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.49 ||
T06asmahsbu:5676: atra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ bhagavati mahāpuruṣatvasaṃpratyayena darśanamātrāt prasādajanakatvaṃ karma saṃdarśayitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5680: atra bhagavataś caturvidhayā vaśitayā sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ paridīpitāḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5687: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.51 ||
T06asmahsbu:5688: atra caturṣv artheṣu satvānāṃ vipravādanaya māro yas tadbhañjakatvena bhagavato daśānāṃ balānāṃ karma saṃdarśitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5693: sthānāsthānajñānabalena hi bhagavān prathame 'rthe mārabhañjako veditavyaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5703: nirādhṛṣyatvād anyatīrthyair bhagavato yathākramaṃ caturvidhaṃ vaiśāradyam udbhāvitaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5706: nirārakṣa asaṃmoṣa gaṇakarṣa namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.53 ||
T06asmahsbu:5707: anena trīṇy arakṣāṇi trīṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhagavataḥ paridīpitāni |
T06asmahsbu:5709: tair hi yathākramaṃ vigṛhyavaktā ca bhavati parṣatsu nirārakṣatvāt |
T06asmahsbu:5714: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.54 ||
T06asmahsbu:5715: anena cāre vihāre vā sarvatra sarvadā vāsarvajñaceṣṭitasyābhāvāt bhagavataḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5717: asarvajño hi kṣīṇakleśo 'py asamudghātitatvād vāsanāyā ekadā bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati bhrāntena rathenety evamādikam asarvajñaceṣṭitaṃ karoti |
T06asmahsbu:5722: abandhyakṛtya satatam asaṃmoṣaḥ namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.55 ||
T06asmahsbu:5723: anena yasya satvasya yo 'rthaḥ karaṇīyo yasmin kāle tatkālānativartanāt |
T06asmahsbu:5724: abandhyaṃ kṛtyaṃ sadā bhagavata ity asaṃmoṣadharmatvaṃ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca saṃdarśitaṃ
T06asmahsbu:5727: mahākaruṇayā yukta hitāśaya namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.56 ||
T06asmahsbu:5728: atra mahākaruṇā bhagavataḥ karmataḥ svabhāvataś ca paridīpitā |
T06asmahsbu:5729: mahākaruṇayā hi bhagavān ṣaḍkṛtvo rātrindivena lokaṃ pratyavekṣate ko hīyate ko vardhate ity evamādi |
T06asmahsbu:5730: tadyogāc ca bhagavataḥ sarvasatveṣu nityaṃ hitāśayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5734: atra cārasasṃ gṛhītaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5737: karmasaṃgṛhītaiś ca tribhiḥ |tadanyasatvottamānām api śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām antikād
T06asmahsbu:5744: nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣeti cārasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍāveṇikā buddhadharmā ye buddhasyaiva saṃvidyante nānyeṣāṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5745: nāsti chandaparihāṇir nāsti vīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāvimuktiparihāṇir ity adhigamasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍ |
T06asmahsbu:5747: anāgate pratyutpanne adhvani tathāgatasyāsaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānam iti |
T06asmahsbu:5751: sarvaṃ vākkarma sarvaṃ manaskarmeti karmasaṃgṛhāitās trayaḥ |
T06asmahsbu:5754: sarvatra sarvasatvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.58 ||
T06asmahsbu:5755: anena tribhiś ca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānāc ca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā |
T06asmahsbu:5756: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogiko nairmāṇikaś ca |
T06asmahsbu:5757: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punar atra sarvasatvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ |
T06asmahsbu:5760: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te || AMsa_20-21.59 ||
T06asmahsbu:5771: akṣayair asamair yukto guṇair lokeṣu dṛśyase |
T06asmahsbu:5772: maṇḍaleṣv apy adṛśyaś ca sarvathā devamānuṣaiḥ || AMsa_20-21.61 ||
T06asmahsbu:5778: nānālokadhātuṣu dṛśyamānatā nirmāṇakāyena (Msa 189) parṣaṇmaṇḍaleṣv api dṛśyamānatā sāṃbhogikena kāyena |
T06asmahsbu:5779: sarvathā cādṛśyamānatā dharmakāyeneti trividhā prabhedavṛttir iti
